data.what_is:
Bloomreach is the world's #1 Commerce Experience Cloud, empowering brands to deliver customer journeys so personalized, they feel like magic. 

It offers a suite of products that drive true personalization and digital commerce growth, including: Discovery, offering AI-driven search and merchandising; Content, offering a headless CMS; and Engagement, offering a leading CDP and marketing automation solutions. 

Together, these solutions combine the power of unified customer and product data with the speed and scale of AI-optimization, enabling revenue-driving digital commerce experiences that convert on any channel and every journey. Bloomreach serves over 850 global brands including Albertsons, Bosch, Puma, FC Bayern Munchen, and Marks & Spencer. For more information, visit Bloomreach.com.

(Exponea was acquired by Bloomreach in 2021.)
data.product_description: Exponea was acquired by Bloomreach in 2021. The Bloomreach digital experience platform connects deep customer data with deep product data, enabling brands to deliver incredible revenue-driving commerce experiences through personalized products and content across all digital touchpoints.We serve digital commerce and marketing professionals looking to transform the way they manage commerce experiences across all touchpoints. We provide a platform for developers to build differentiated solutions using modern architecture, and for merchants and marketers to take control and create experiences that our platform helps personalize and optimize for their customers at scale.We are best suited for commerce companies facing challenges such as:- Marketing that targets customers but does not deliver a relevant experience - products they do not want or that are out of stock- Broken commerce experiences with poor product discovery and personalization that is not effective- Legacy architecture that slows businesses down- Legacy siloed solutions for managing their products and customers- Disparate, inaccessible data- Manually intensive processes, including campaign execution, merchandising, and tracking- Slow time-to-market

pricing_plans.plan_description: Manage your storefront and easily add products to any page with Bloomreach's powerful APIs and software solutions designed to help you capture more revenue.
plan_features: Set up a new store or microsite faster with pre-built integrations to blazingly fast PWA storefronts like Vue Storefront, React Storefront, SAP Spartacus and more.
Bloomreach Content is a fully SaaS-based, API-first platform.

pricing_plans.plan_description:
Bloomreach has the fastest ROI of any product discovery solution on the market.
Search - Bloomreach's AI-driven Search for eCommerce allows your teams to create a sophisticated search and product discovery experience that drives conversions and revenue.
Merchandising - A set of AI-driven merchandising tools to help you make impactful and effective changes that convert more traffic.
Recommendations and Pathways - Convert Better on Any Page of Your Website. 96% of visitors to your website are there to browse, not buy. With recommendations, you can present relevant products and nudge more visitors to convert.
SEO - Enhance the work of your SEO team with AI-powered SEO automation to target the most profitable keywords, the long-tail, and turn more clicks into sales.
plan_features: Optimizing your site for long-tail queries.
Improve Discoverability - drive more organic traffic to your site.
A/B tests and powerful analytics for the best results
Bloomreach's intelligent index, including search intent and filter behavior.
Intuitive Merchandising Tools - Powerful multi-site functionality

pricing_plans.plan_description:
Understand customer behavior, enrich customer data through AI, and immediately launch omni-channel campaigns across all channels.
SMS & Mobile Messaging - Personalized SMS and WhatsApp messages with add-on mobile app features to drive incremental revenue from your mobile strategy.
Email Marketing - Personalized email marketing that puts the customer first, from sign-up to repeat purchase, so you send fewer emails to make more money.
Web & App Personalization - On-site personalization (with add-on in-app personalization) and A/B testing -- powered by real-time, first-party data for the fastest ROI on the market.
Intelligence & Orchestration - Perfect for getting started and trying Bloomreach's powerful AI predictions, data unification, and omnichannel orchestration capabilities.
Ad Optimization - Reduce CAC on ad platforms like Facebook, Google, Instagram, and Snapchat with better visibility into historical and predicted user behavior.
Enterprise Engagement - The ultimate omnichannel marketing solution that includes all your best marketing channels, customer data, AI, and advanced analytics.

initial_reviews.review_title: A super smart, scalable solution that can continue to grow alongside your business.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach's offers a ton of flexibility, reducing the need to invest in multiple invididual tools meaning improved cost efficiences and increased speed from insight to action, as we're able to analyse and execute on multiple channels, all from the same platform.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
For new users Bloomreach can be a bit of a learning curve but it's a worthwhile investment of time and they offer plenty of training opportunities and resources. Their public knowledgebase is also incredibly helpful as a user, but also while we were vetting Bloomreach against other providers as it gave us a good overview of what's actually possible within the tool.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach has helped us gain a much deeper understanding of our customers including their behavioural patterns  and preferences through its single customer view, and personalise their experience using the same tool. This was especially important for us as we were previously using multiple tools for difference purproses and the integrations between each were proving limited and highly time consuing to maintain. It's helped us scale our e-commerce growth across our multiple brands, markets, categories, and customer segments and track performance against our core KPIs in real-time.

review_question_answers.answer: Bloomreach has helped us gain a much deeper understanding of our customers including their behavioural patterns  and preferences through its single customer view, and personalise their experience using the same tool. This was especially important for us as we were previously using multiple tools for difference purproses and the integrations between each were proving limited and highly time consuing to maintain. It's helped us scale our e-commerce growth across our multiple brands, markets, categories, and customer segments and track performance against our core KPIs in real-time.

initial_reviews.review_title: Personalising our on-site content using Bloomreach
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach has been my first forray into personalising content, single customer view etc, and the platform has been a fantastic introduction into the possibilities when it comes to getting the right content in front of the right user. We primarily work within Experiments and Weblayers, and the Bloomreach interface is so simple and user-friendly when it comes to making changes to existing content, or even creating brand new modals, pop-ups and banners to surface across our website. The filters are incredibly intuitive and easy to set up, save and re-use across multiple workstreams, and the analytics dashboards are expansive and contain all of the relevant data for the metrics we are tracking. The AI tool for creating new dashboards on the spot is particularly useful as well. Actually implementing tests once created is a doddle, and it has given our team (marketing) a lot more ownership of these types of experiments, whereas previously this was something almost entirely owned by a separate produce department. The customer support is second-to-none, with live chat being available to help out with any issues, almost at a moment's notice, and for more in-depth, development support, the team are always willing to jump on a call or lend their experence where they can.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
On occasion the page editor in experiments can feel a bit clunky, and sometimes changes to HTML either don't seem to take effect or result in an on-page experience that is unexpected. However live chat are always on hand to resolve any issues that I have.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a holiday business, every one of our customers wants something different in their search; whether it's a cheap break, a range of options to choose from, specific activity-based experiences, sustainable hotels etc etc. Previously we were not able to target individual customers (or segments) with tailored messaging, content, imagery, promotions - we simply had to go with the prominent demographic. Using Bloomreach we can now personalise every landing page to the specific customer need, showcasing highly-relevant products and promotions in a way that maximises conversion opportunities whilst still achieving our other important on page goals (SEO etc).

initial_reviews.review_title: Always Bloomreach!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is absolutely the best tool! Its easy to use, very intuitive. Uses SQL logic to create segmentations. Love the scenarios cretion and how you can see if there is a problem. Customer support is amazing, always ready to help out, if they dont know what the issue is, they will find somebody or give contact and then they chceck in if my problem is solved or the person helped me enought. Implementation is eaysy, I guess, not my field. But everytime I need to add something or import somebody get it done. I use Bloomreach everyday. Sometimes I just check someting, sometimes I spend hours.  Bloomreach is very complex and its impossible for me to already know everything but which each new experience I find it more and more usefull and easy to use. Thank you fot the multilevel reporting, still didnt get much time to explore it but its very usefull. Finnaly got the chance to tall to the AI tool. Also very usefull!

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I have only 3 thing I would love to have in Bloomreach, that are not there now.
1) all countries in the same currency! Right now I have to convert currency by hand in my reviews.
2) I cant save my jinja code untill its completely correct. This way I cant work on something than save it and come back to it later. I know I can use Visual Studio code, but that another tool, it would be great if even not ready code could be saved with red mark on it, to visually show its not done.
3)  start using the decimal , and not . thnaks that would also help alot, since I have to convert the numbers I download.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thanks to Bloomreach we have almost everything in our hand, like 90 % of the thing I need to achieve I can do it with Bloomreach. Sure, we sometimes get to some limities, but we can always work our way around it and we have all the Bloomreach support to help us.

initial_reviews.review_title: Whole New World with Bloomreach!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
As an update from a year into using Bloomreach  -  I want to genuinely say this platform is a whole new world and has elevated the way we communicate to our customers. From our targeting, our campaign structure, our ideas, and more. I feel we are able to be innovative vs wondering what "walls" we will hit when trying to build out campaigns.

I would also like to take this time to SHOUT-OUT the wonderful team people at Bloomreach who have helped us be successful: Lindsey (our go-to person), Mohammed (we always love to chat with you), Mark (thanks for everything), Peter (we still miss you), and the rest of the lovely souls we've come across. We always know if we have a question, we can rely on y'all to help us and point us in the right direction.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It would greatly enhance our experience for the following: (1) ability to export clickmaps for reporting, (2) making the survey feature more easy to use for marketers, (3) making polls easier to create within emails, (4) easier to set-up reports.

Double-please for the ability to export clickmaps! Would help a lot at the moment to share the results with our Brand team and agencies who don't go into Bloomreach as often (or have access). Currently, we have to take screenshots and put them together.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer retention and engagement.

initial_reviews.review_title: Fantastic CDP/CRM with incredible support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The live chat support and help from our CSM is incredible, I've not seen support as good as this from any SAAS product. When we have issues on setting up campaigns, or dashboards, we get live chat help within the platform within a matter of minutes.

The API is incredibly straightforward to work with as well, so integrations have been very simple.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There can be a learning curve to overcome for dashboard creation, though this can be overcome through support. Once you've got the hang of setup it's actually really straightforward to use.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use this as out full CDP, storing all data and events related to customers on our platforms. We also use the platform for communicating with our guests through the database, across email , push and advertising audiences.

What I like the most about Bloomreach is that it's user-friendly. I like that we can build scenarios by drag and drop. I found it easy to edit/make emails too. Intenally we had a training session for a few hours, and I could alrady start using the features after the session which was amazing.
Sometimes, I struggle to understand terms in Bloomreach but there are excellent documentations that is easy to find the information I want. My favorite part when struggling is the live chat feature where we can communicate with Bloomreach professionals in no time and you get perfect answer every time. They are fast, knowledgeble and helpful that makes my journey with Bloomreach super positive!

Since I'm considered as a beginner, sometimes it's difficult to understand the meaning of each term. And  what each metric is for. I believe it just takes time in the beginning to get used to all of it and I know that they are willing to help with those questions so I'm not that worried.

CRM email marketing that was high cost and set content. Bloomreach is benefitial both from the budget and user perspecvites.

initial_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach unlocking CRM potential
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is an extremely fluid system. Quick in response but has no shortage of potential avenues to explore.

It is very intuitive and I feel I have learnt how to use the system quickly due to its usability, however there is plenty more to discover to help take my companies communications to the next level.

The reporting is highly visual and it is straightforward to build powerful insights and segmentations that will drive our business forward.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Some of the integrations with our business has a initial sticking point. Working in the holiday sector we refer to specific events that occur in the future at a certain point.

Our emails have to refer to the specific events at a point in time which initially wasn't native to the platform.

The team at bloomreach however have been extremely supportive and managed to use their aggregation to overcome this. They have also built a new group by function to enable us to look at the latest instance which is required for our business.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Developing a deep personalisation by creating unique communications in a wasn't use quick way.

Personalization: Bloomreach enables businesses to deliver personalized experiences to their users based on user behavior, preferences, and other relevant data.
Optimization: Bloomreach helps businesses optimize their digital experiences by analyzing user behavior, testing different variations, and identifying opportunities for improvement.
Analytics and Insights: Bloomreach provides analytics and insights to help businesses understand user behavior, measure the performance of their digital experiences, and make data-driven decisions for optimization and personalization.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?

Bloomreach solves several critical business problems related to digital experience management, personalization, and optimization. As a business we weren't able to deliver personalised experience to our customers.Bloomreach helps solve this problem by providing tools and capabilities for personalization, allowing businesses to tailor content, product recommendations, and marketing messages to individual customer preferences and behaviors.

initial_reviews.review_title: CRM migration and transformation
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The Bloomreach team was professional, helpful, and very knowledgeable throughout our lengthy platform and data migration. We have migrated multiple separate business areas using different platforms successfully into Bloomreach. The platform provides an intuitive UX for basic use and scope to grow for multi-channel integration across various teams each using the platform for different purposes. The platform is now integral to our daily business and provides insight for future planning.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Our business is Travel focused and some elements of the functionality cater towards retail. But we have been assured this is something the Bloomreach team is working on.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
A one-stop shop for all our data integration and multichannel campaign execution. Development of end to end journeys and plugging in additional platforms to support this. Centralising our data for profiling, mining and growth.

Bloomreach excels in several areas. Its intuitive interface ensures ease of use, simplifying navigation for users. Implementation is a breeze thanks to its user-friendly setup process. Their customer support is top-notch, providing timely assistance whenever needed. With frequent updates and improvements, users can rely on Bloomreach regularly. The platform boasts a vast array of features, catering to diverse business needs. Integration is seamless, allowing for smooth collaboration with existing systems, enhancing overall efficiency.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach's load time needs improvement, and simple tasks sometimes require complex solutions. It lacks out-of-the-box solutions, complicating implementation for users seeking more streamlined processes.

Bloomreach seamlessly connects customers, customer data, and marketing campaigns. Its robust system enables businesses to integrate customer insights effectively, ensuring targeted and personalized marketing strategies for enhanced engagement and conversions.

initial_reviews.review_title: User friendly and very helpful staff
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
I  find Bloomreach to be exceptionally user-friendly offering a a lot of features to seamlessly integrate the business needs, including the incorporation of specific data directly within the platform for future use. The support team has been a standout highlight, demonstrating unwavering dedication and friendliness. They're consistently striving to identify solutions for any raised issues.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
A suggestion for Bloomreach improvement is enhancing the functionality around report building and aesthetics. Currently, there's a limited selection of charts available, and some may not align well with specific needs. A more diverse and adaptable range of charts could greatly enhance the reporting experience.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach is helping us solve our targeting problems. By having a lot of custom data stored on a member, we're able to use segmentation to sharpen the targeting of members we wish to target. Bloomreach also enables us to see how many members fit in a specific pot within the segmentation we're looking at before sending the email to make sure we're happy with the volume.

Intuitive.
Great support.
Does everything.
Allows advanced trouble-shooting with Jinja.
Easy to implement.
Plug and play library.
Real-time data and your fingertips.
Customer journey capability.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There are a handful of niggly things that would be useful (e.g. parameter triggers, loops, wait nodes based on events), but they are very specific use cases and Bloomreach are very receptive to enhancement requests and keeping customers happy.

A single solution that allows us to build customer journeys and do multi-stage, multi-channel marketing in real-time.
Provide 1:1 real-time offers on web & app.
Integrate and manage data from multiple sources.
Fast set-up and implementation.
Easy to train end-users due to the training courses and support.

The tool is fast for processing data (real-time for many processes). This speed, combined with an intuitive interface, allows me to easily create great marketing and personalization orchestration on-site, in ads, and for email & SMS.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There are some limitations for searchable fields in recommendations that impact my use of this feature, there are ways around it, but additional searchable fields would not hurt. There are also some limitations regarding downloading report data in csv format but nothing of fundamental importance.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach enables us to produce a lot of more sophisticated marketing without needing a lot of staff to support it. It has also improved our personalization of  site and email massively (segmented list pages, customer-specific recommendations and activation etc)

initial_reviews.review_title: Best solution for medium and large businesses customer management and retention
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Despite its potential complexity, the system offers simple yet sophisticated solutions suitable for smaller businesses as much for large corporations. Bloomreach can grow with your business, in fact it helps to grow it more than anything else. For smaller organisations or beginners it offers plenty of pre-defined options that enable quick start and great number of learning sources and documentation to get you on board and develop your campaigns and customer management further.  Large organisations appreciate the flexibility that comes with Bloomreach in terms of pre-definer or easily built connectors for their other systems and detailed reporting.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The number of options is enormous and for newbies it could be jungle to cut through at first, so guidance from skilled user or consultant is important in order not to get lost among all the possibilities.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Unified customer data collection and management for segmentation, managing email marketing campaigns and communicating with other marketing tools with highly targeted marketing

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach's offers a ton of flexibility, reducing the need to invest in multiple invididual tools meaning improved cost efficiences and increased speed from insight to action, as we're able to analyse and execute on multiple channels, all from the same platform.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
For new users Bloomreach can be a bit of a learning curve but it's a worthwhile investment of time and they offer plenty of training opportunities and resources. Their public knowledgebase is also incredibly helpful as a user, but also while we were vetting Bloomreach against other providers as it gave us a good overview of what's actually possible within the tool.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach has helped us gain a much deeper understanding of our customers including their behavioural patterns  and preferences through its single customer view, and personalise their experience using the same tool. This was especially important for us as we were previously using multiple tools for difference purproses and the integrations between each were proving limited and highly time consuing to maintain. It's helped us scale our e-commerce growth across our multiple brands, markets, categories, and customer segments and track performance against our core KPIs in real-time.

all_reviews.review_title: Personalising our on-site content using Bloomreach
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach has been my first forray into personalising content, single customer view etc, and the platform has been a fantastic introduction into the possibilities when it comes to getting the right content in front of the right user. We primarily work within Experiments and Weblayers, and the Bloomreach interface is so simple and user-friendly when it comes to making changes to existing content, or even creating brand new modals, pop-ups and banners to surface across our website. The filters are incredibly intuitive and easy to set up, save and re-use across multiple workstreams, and the analytics dashboards are expansive and contain all of the relevant data for the metrics we are tracking. The AI tool for creating new dashboards on the spot is particularly useful as well. Actually implementing tests once created is a doddle, and it has given our team (marketing) a lot more ownership of these types of experiments, whereas previously this was something almost entirely owned by a separate produce department. The customer support is second-to-none, with live chat being available to help out with any issues, almost at a moment's notice, and for more in-depth, development support, the team are always willing to jump on a call or lend their experence where they can.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
On occasion the page editor in experiments can feel a bit clunky, and sometimes changes to HTML either don't seem to take effect or result in an on-page experience that is unexpected. However live chat are always on hand to resolve any issues that I have.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a holiday business, every one of our customers wants something different in their search; whether it's a cheap break, a range of options to choose from, specific activity-based experiences, sustainable hotels etc etc. Previously we were not able to target individual customers (or segments) with tailored messaging, content, imagery, promotions - we simply had to go with the prominent demographic. Using Bloomreach we can now personalise every landing page to the specific customer need, showcasing highly-relevant products and promotions in a way that maximises conversion opportunities whilst still achieving our other important on page goals (SEO etc).

all_reviews.review_title: Always Bloomreach!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is absolutely the best tool! Its easy to use, very intuitive. Uses SQL logic to create segmentations. Love the scenarios cretion and how you can see if there is a problem. Customer support is amazing, always ready to help out, if they dont know what the issue is, they will find somebody or give contact and then they chceck in if my problem is solved or the person helped me enought. Implementation is eaysy, I guess, not my field. But everytime I need to add something or import somebody get it done. I use Bloomreach everyday. Sometimes I just check someting, sometimes I spend hours.  Bloomreach is very complex and its impossible for me to already know everything but which each new experience I find it more and more usefull and easy to use. Thank you fot the multilevel reporting, still didnt get much time to explore it but its very usefull. Finnaly got the chance to tall to the AI tool. Also very usefull!

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I have only 3 thing I would love to have in Bloomreach, that are not there now.
1) all countries in the same currency! Right now I have to convert currency by hand in my reviews.
2) I cant save my jinja code untill its completely correct. This way I cant work on something than save it and come back to it later. I know I can use Visual Studio code, but that another tool, it would be great if even not ready code could be saved with red mark on it, to visually show its not done.
3)  start using the decimal , and not . thnaks that would also help alot, since I have to convert the numbers I download.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thanks to Bloomreach we have almost everything in our hand, like 90 % of the thing I need to achieve I can do it with Bloomreach. Sure, we sometimes get to some limities, but we can always work our way around it and we have all the Bloomreach support to help us.

all_reviews.review_title: Whole New World with Bloomreach!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
As an update from a year into using Bloomreach  -  I want to genuinely say this platform is a whole new world and has elevated the way we communicate to our customers. From our targeting, our campaign structure, our ideas, and more. I feel we are able to be innovative vs wondering what "walls" we will hit when trying to build out campaigns.

I would also like to take this time to SHOUT-OUT the wonderful team people at Bloomreach who have helped us be successful: Lindsey (our go-to person), Mohammed (we always love to chat with you), Mark (thanks for everything), Peter (we still miss you), and the rest of the lovely souls we've come across. We always know if we have a question, we can rely on y'all to help us and point us in the right direction.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It would greatly enhance our experience for the following: (1) ability to export clickmaps for reporting, (2) making the survey feature more easy to use for marketers, (3) making polls easier to create within emails, (4) easier to set-up reports.

Double-please for the ability to export clickmaps! Would help a lot at the moment to share the results with our Brand team and agencies who don't go into Bloomreach as often (or have access). Currently, we have to take screenshots and put them together.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer retention and engagement.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic CDP/CRM with incredible support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The live chat support and help from our CSM is incredible, I've not seen support as good as this from any SAAS product. When we have issues on setting up campaigns, or dashboards, we get live chat help within the platform within a matter of minutes.

The API is incredibly straightforward to work with as well, so integrations have been very simple.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There can be a learning curve to overcome for dashboard creation, though this can be overcome through support. Once you've got the hang of setup it's actually really straightforward to use.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use this as out full CDP, storing all data and events related to customers on our platforms. We also use the platform for communicating with our guests through the database, across email , push and advertising audiences.

all_reviews.review_content:

What I like the most about Bloomreach is that it's user-friendly. I like that we can build scenarios by drag and drop. I found it easy to edit/make emails too. Intenally we had a training session for a few hours, and I could alrady start using the features after the session which was amazing.
Sometimes, I struggle to understand terms in Bloomreach but there are excellent documentations that is easy to find the information I want. My favorite part when struggling is the live chat feature where we can communicate with Bloomreach professionals in no time and you get perfect answer every time. They are fast, knowledgeble and helpful that makes my journey with Bloomreach super positive!

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Since I'm considered as a beginner, sometimes it's difficult to understand the meaning of each term. And  what each metric is for. I believe it just takes time in the beginning to get used to all of it and I know that they are willing to help with those questions so I'm not that worried.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
CRM email marketing that was high cost and set content. Bloomreach is benefitial both from the budget and user perspecvites.

Bloomreach is an extremely fluid system. Quick in response but has no shortage of potential avenues to explore.

It is very intuitive and I feel I have learnt how to use the system quickly due to its usability, however there is plenty more to discover to help take my companies communications to the next level.

The reporting is highly visual and it is straightforward to build powerful insights and segmentations that will drive our business forward.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Some of the integrations with our business has a initial sticking point. Working in the holiday sector we refer to specific events that occur in the future at a certain point.

Our emails have to refer to the specific events at a point in time which initially wasn't native to the platform.

The team at bloomreach however have been extremely supportive and managed to use their aggregation to overcome this. They have also built a new group by function to enable us to look at the latest instance which is required for our business.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Developing a deep personalisation by creating unique communications in a wasn't use quick way.

all_reviews.review_content:

The Bloomreach team was professional, helpful, and very knowledgeable throughout our lengthy platform and data migration. We have migrated multiple separate business areas using different platforms successfully into Bloomreach. The platform provides an intuitive UX for basic use and scope to grow for multi-channel integration across various teams each using the platform for different purposes. The platform is now integral to our daily business and provides insight for future planning.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Our business is Travel focused and some elements of the functionality cater towards retail. But we have been assured this is something the Bloomreach team is working on.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
A one-stop shop for all our data integration and multichannel campaign execution. Development of end to end journeys and plugging in additional platforms to support this. Centralising our data for profiling, mining and growth.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
I  find Bloomreach to be exceptionally user-friendly offering a a lot of features to seamlessly integrate the business needs, including the incorporation of specific data directly within the platform for future use. The support team has been a standout highlight, demonstrating unwavering dedication and friendliness. They're consistently striving to identify solutions for any raised issues.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
A suggestion for Bloomreach improvement is enhancing the functionality around report building and aesthetics. Currently, there's a limited selection of charts available, and some may not align well with specific needs. A more diverse and adaptable range of charts could greatly enhance the reporting experience.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach is helping us solve our targeting problems. By having a lot of custom data stored on a member, we're able to use segmentation to sharpen the targeting of members we wish to target. Bloomreach also enables us to see how many members fit in a specific pot within the segmentation we're looking at before sending the email to make sure we're happy with the volume.

The tool is fast for processing data (real-time for many processes). This speed, combined with an intuitive interface, allows me to easily create great marketing and personalization orchestration on-site, in ads, and for email & SMS.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There are some limitations for searchable fields in recommendations that impact my use of this feature, there are ways around it, but additional searchable fields would not hurt. There are also some limitations regarding downloading report data in csv format but nothing of fundamental importance.

Bloomreach enables us to produce a lot of more sophisticated marketing without needing a lot of staff to support it. It has also improved our personalization of  site and email massively (segmented list pages, customer-specific recommendations and activation etc)

all_reviews.review_title: Best solution for medium and large businesses customer management and retention
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Despite its potential complexity, the system offers simple yet sophisticated solutions suitable for smaller businesses as much for large corporations. Bloomreach can grow with your business, in fact it helps to grow it more than anything else. For smaller organisations or beginners it offers plenty of pre-defined options that enable quick start and great number of learning sources and documentation to get you on board and develop your campaigns and customer management further.  Large organisations appreciate the flexibility that comes with Bloomreach in terms of pre-definer or easily built connectors for their other systems and detailed reporting.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The number of options is enormous and for newbies it could be jungle to cut through at first, so guidance from skilled user or consultant is important in order not to get lost among all the possibilities.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Unified customer data collection and management for segmentation, managing email marketing campaigns and communicating with other marketing tools with highly targeted marketing

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent analytics, targeted messaging: Bloomreach is taking it up a notch!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach integrates customer data seamlessly for targeted communications across various channels. The platform, with its slight learning curve, is supported by a dedicated Customer Success Manager and an online support team. Robust reporting eliminates data export needs, allowing easy creation of insightful tables, graphs, and charts. In my brief experience, Bloomreach has proven exceptionally effective.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There is a slight learning curve - regarding segmentation/report building - to get a hang of but it isn't too difficult to learn and there are loads of resources: support team, BR academy, documentation and your very own CSM.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach solves the following problems:
- Quickly an effectively targeting the right customer with the right message at the right time
- Allows split testing functionality with statistical significance calculations to determine which split performed best
- Easy reporting within the platform makes sharing KPIs, findings, recommendations with the wider team efficient.
- Customer tracking is easy with their single customer view.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
In comparison to other more dated platforms, Bloomreach is a breeze to use, and efficient. I use Bloomreach every day, and find it second nature, building emails, scenarios and reporting on customer engagement.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Not that you often need help, the customer support chat can be a little exhasperating. On the odd occasion I've felt I've had to walk them through things when I need the solution and wondered which one of us works for Bloomreach haha. They are extremely friendly though.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
They make its exptremely easy to A/B test emails, and analyse the data afterwards. For example, with Bloomreach I can A/B test two emails, sending each to 20% of our customer database, and send the remaining 60% to the winner. Not all platforms can support this test.

all_reviews.review_title: Technology is behind current trends, support lacking, templating limited, sales practice unhelpful
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Quite a lot is packed into one system, but arguably this is a bad thing as not one of them is cutting edge.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The platform is not hard to use, but other platforms are better. The support is generally unhelpful with anything more than a basic problem going unfixed or taking a lond time. The template language is not a full implementation so it's hard to learn. Also, if you run over expect a conversation about your options very close to the contract end giving you little time to consider anything else.

CDP and communications

all_reviews.review_title: User-friendly, efficient platform and available support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is a highly regarded CRM platform known for its user-friendly interface, efficient features, and exceptional support. Its intuitive design makes it easy for users of all technical backgrounds to navigate the platform effortlessly. With a comprehensive suite of CRM functionalities, Bloomreach enables businesses to streamline processes, automate tasks, and make data-driven decisions. Furthermore, the platform's dedicated support team ensures prompt assistance, enhancing the overall user experience. For a CRM solution that combines usability, efficiency, and outstanding support, Bloomreach is the top choice.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
While Bloomreach is a feature-rich CRM platform, it does have a couple of downsides. One issue is the high volume of events generated, which can lead to data overload and require extra effort to manage and analyze. Additionally, Bloomreach has limited storage capacity if we want to be cost efficient, potentially posing challenges for businesses with extensive data or long-term storage needs with a limited budget. Despite these drawbacks, Bloomreach remains a powerful CRM solution, but users should be aware of these considerations and plan accordingly.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach solves key problems in customer relationship management, benefiting businesses in several ways:

Streamlining customer interactions for improved efficiency and satisfaction.
Generating and converting leads more effectively.
Automating processes to increase productivity and resource allocation.
Enabling data-driven decision making through customer data analysis.
Enhancing customer support for timely and satisfactory resolutions.
These solutions provided by Bloomreach help businesses optimize their CRM efforts, drive revenue growth, and improve overall customer satisfaction.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Product! Excellent Team!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
From a users perspective, the tool is "intuitive" and easy to use. While there is a TON of information that can feel overwhelming, the experience, enablement and support teams at BR make that transition easy.

Solutions architects are "top notch" are commited to finding solutions to ensure the tool best works for the business team. Even if Bloomreach is not able to meet those expectations, they listen and often take down those ideas to input into their roadmaps for future developement.

Flexibility is a key theme for Bloomreach. Teams are able to to "self-service" , whether it's a technical team pulling their own API to trouble shoot or configuring attributes to a business team being able to manually make updates to page or utilize the BR algo. Addiitonally, when trying to understand why products rank a certain way, the BR ranking diagnotic empowers the team to review this and adjust their rules as needed.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is often enhancing and releasing new features for their product. Communication and understanding of those things can get lost, misunderstood and often don't get utilized or properly communicated until many months after the release.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach provides us a "one stop shop" for search and merchandising needs. Teams can easily optimize these areas using Bloomreach insights and/or their own analyses. Their tool is efficient and flexible, allowing for manual manipulation, full algo or a combo of both.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: The price. It's quite an expensive solution. Additionally, it can be a bit frustrating that you have to pay extra for each additional feature.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Bloomreach, our chosen Customer Data Experience Platform (CDXP), has significantly streamlined our customer engagement process. It efficiently identifies and services our customers' individual needs, making personalized interactions a breeze. From simplifying email marketing to providing personalized in-app content and targeted push notifications, Bloomreach has been instrumental in enhancing our customer experience. Its capability to tailor services and content to each user has not only improved our efficiency but also enriched our customer interactions.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Product & easy to use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach made it really easy to store data from various sources using different intergrations methods to truly provide a single view of a customer. It is easy to use and the onboarding team have been great in answering questions and overcoming any challenges.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The documenation in some areas needs to be updated as the product continues to grow, some of the documentation was outdated but still helps in finding the correct way to complete the tasks.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach is helping to solve the biggest challenge of being able to view a single truth of the customer and journey they go through from start to finish with our products. Its lets us easily see where we have gaps in Marketing and analyse the impact of changes made.

all_reviews.review_title: Incredibly powerful martech platform, unleash your imagination
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The support staff are tremendous! They're simply the best team you could hope to have in your back pocket. There's also tonnes of support materials, documentation, training and content to inspire. Brilliant to have access to all your customer engagement and sales data in one place.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It's low code, so when it comes to the analytics, you don't have the freedom of a blank cell to create queries from scratch; there's a middle ground you have to get your brain into, but luckily the team are on hand at any time to help get you to where you need to be.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer understanding, marketing strategy and omnichannel customer lifecycle marketing

all_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach is a flexible and powerful tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The flexible way of creating segmentations and scenarios. We can in an easy way streamline our daily campaigns towards our customers. Another great thing about Bloomreach is that it's easy to integrate with other sources of information. The customer's support is always there to help or give tips if needed.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is not a good tool for reporting or backtracking data. There are some functions but not to the extent of relying on the data.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We save a lot of time executing campaigns as we can reuse scenarios and use our segmentations in various ways. Another benefit is that we can easily collaborate in Bloomreach across different departments.

all_reviews.review_title: Best in class solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is an extremely intuitative platform that allows us to scale communications to our customers effortlessly. It integrates with our other marketing platforms brilliantly for passing audience insights across.
I would definitely recommend using Bloomreach Engagement due to its simple UX yet capability to solve numerous business problems such as capturing and storing consent, regulatory requirements and testing at scale.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
That there's no auto-save when working in-scenario and that multiple users cannot collabortate on one scenario at once.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach allows us to activate more segments of our customers than we were able to using other platforms.

all_reviews.review_title: best CRM / CDP platform out there
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is the most flexible CPD platform I have ever used. As long as you have time to put in to build reports, analysis, funnels, metrics, etc. It's really one of those platforms where you take out what you put in, as long as you're willing to invest the time you can really take value from it. In addition

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The main downsides to Bloomreach are:
- for all the flexibility bloomreach offers, that requires a great deal of time invested. In addition to this, it can be quite overwhelming to start until you feel quite knowledgeable about the platform
- be careful with processed events because they quickly rack up. remember that everything generates an event - campaigns, facebook audiences, AB tests. A lot of times the best practises that you are told to follow make this worse

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
The accessibility of customer insights has massively improved for us since we implemented bloomreach. Also now that the platform is implemented we require a lot less dev work to get things done than in our old platform.

all_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach is one of the best CDP/CRM tools to use for starters in the e-commerce industry.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The new features (such as product recommendation, new integrations) were really a great addition. We were able to use it in a lot of our campaigns although we had issues during the implementation, the support team helped us resolve it. They constantly roll-out new features (AI) to keep up with the technology. I also like that they hold webinars to  keep you updated on the new features and best practices.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The user interface could be a bit overwhelming at first, BUT it'll be easier to navigate once you get the hang of it. Some of the modules (like filtering on the reports, display of graphs, analysis etc.) could still be improved. I suggest a bit of a user view personalization (like widegets and user groups) would be good to simplify and streamline the user experience. the pricing could be another factor but I guess you get what you pay for.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing automation, unified customer view, campaign personalization, reports generation all in one platform.

all_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach is the best CRM tool that I have ever used.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
I like how user-friendly the tool is and how I can drill down data all the way down to the customer level. Creating and improving a customer's journey can be unique and simple drag & drop or click away. I also like how the tool interacts with itself and how you can use the different tools/features across multiple product integrations.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I feel that the Bloomreach Academy can be more in-depth and incorporate more used cases and training scenarios on each topic offered especially for users who for example. are not coders or have a dev background. The training should allow any user, no matter their background to confidently use all aspects of the tool.

Also, look at improving the support structure once the integration/onboarding phase has been completed. Give your customers for example - 5hrs a month free for assistance with projects/used cases/ products etc.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Content automation, promotional automation, high-level segmentation, onsite and real-time messaging, in-depth reporting, product awareness, and recommendations, creating unique customer journeys.

all_reviews.review_title: A versatile DXM product
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The documentation is so good it allows you to understand all the configuration, set up, installation and extension points.
The extension points are well documented and the architectural design of hippo allows you to do practically everything: customization, integration, etc...
The support team is one of the best I worked with. They are quick answering and really helpful.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The lucene indexation phase can take really long when you start,run an installation from scratch (with an empty repository folder where the lucene index files are stored). There are at least 2 strategies to shorten this time but none of them address starting the first server node in a clustered environment.
The frontend framework in the cms interface is apache wicket. This is a complex framework with a steep learning curve and developers have to be very careful as there can be issues when you add a perspective, for example. This is the only limiting point in what concerns customization because every other point is really escalable and easy to work with.
Then there is also a limitation in JCR queries that don't allow complex joins or sorts. Complex queries they require a workaround sometimes. We have some performance issues in very minimal cases where we required a workaround.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
For the client, Bloomreach is the selected option to centralize most of the content that is displayed in the company app and website. It covers the content for many channels and sections.
Content editors have a well organized way to create, modify, delete content. Also the translation management starts here too, this is also used extensively.
Then there are many endpoints made available to consume this content in many different ways in the different parts of the app/website.

The support team is one of the best I worked with. They are quick answering and really helpful.

all_reviews.review_title: Constantly surprising and opening new possibilities in the way we think and work
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The first time I saw BR in action, I was impressed by the canvas for creating scenarios. And it is still one of the things where you can do impressive things quickly and conveniently. I also like making new segmentations and aggregates to your customer profiles based on their behavior that you can use further in your scenarios and analysis. The surveys are also welcome as you can cluster your customers based on their answers and act appropriately. And last but not least, the working environment is very user friendly.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is not a database. You need to know how it works and learn the logic to get the maximum out of it. Reports are also not as flexible as one would expect (it is difficult to combine data from various events) and are limited in terms of the output number of rows.
Also, the number of events to be processed and stored will likely grow faster than expected, so be prepared to upgrade to a higher tier soon after the onboarding.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Communicating marketing to customers from one place using various channels (newsletters, push notifications, sms) and enabling the personalized approach. It saves us time and brings more efficiency to what we do.

all_reviews.review_title: Efficiently working website for e-marketing automation and customer engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Adding connectors to other platforms through built-in APIs or webhooks is simple, and the UI is pretty easy to use. It enables you to mix several data sources and provide them with logical processes. Businesses can produce, manage, and distribute content across many channels and devices thanks to Bloomreach's powerful content management tools. Delivering personalized content, suggestions, and consumer experiences is made possible by Bloomreach's cutting-edge personalization features.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Understanding some more complex capabilities can be challenging, and the associated documentation can be confusing. Understanding the data manager and tag management portion has been complicated.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Giving customers a chance to integrate their first-party data from various sources and enhancing their online, push, and paid media experiences. We are growing our onboarding and in-life CRM with the aid of Bloomreach. We utilize it to communicate one-to-many with our clients, sending out campaigns and newsletters and analyzing the effects.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: Adding connectors to other platforms through built-in APIs or webhooks is simple, and the UI is pretty easy to use. It enables you to mix several data sources and provide them with logical processes. Businesses can produce, manage, and distribute content across many channels and devices thanks to Bloomreach's powerful content management tools. Delivering personalized content, suggestions, and consumer experiences is made possible by Bloomreach's cutting-edge personalization features.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: Understanding some more complex capabilities can be challenging, and the associated documentation can be confusing. Understanding the data manager and tag management portion has been complicated.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Giving customers a chance to integrate their first-party data from various sources and enhancing their online, push, and paid media experiences. We are growing our onboarding and in-life CRM with the aid of Bloomreach. We utilize it to communicate one-to-many with our clients, sending out campaigns and newsletters and analyzing the effects.

all_reviews.review_title: Really improved our website search experience!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is really easy to use to manage search and content personalisation. The algorithm is great - it really does help with search results rankings without having to intervene. The dashboard is intuitive and it's easy to setup tweaks to further enhance search results if needed - there are many options to choose from, boosting or permanent placement at a certain location or adding synonyms. We also love the recommendations feature - it's really easy to setup widgets to further personalise the customer experience on our website. There is a lot of help content should you need it and we've never had an issue getting support via their ticketing system.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Like everything else, there are crossovers with other personalisation and optimisation tools. We have a few solutions in use at the moment so we might not be using Bloomreach to its full potential. This isn't so much a Bloomreach issue - it's more to consider what you already have and what specifically from Bloomreach you'll to focus on.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach has been instrumental at solving many of our search issues - our customers are so much more happier with the search experience since we implemented Bloomreach. And at any given moment we are able to use this platform to deliver tweaks to respond to changing user needs.

all_reviews.review_title: Everything in one place
all_reviews.review_content:

Bloomreach combine the best tools a marketer needs with little time spending on integration. The possibility to match analytics behaviour with crm data is just amazing. I would like to say as well that the assistance is well prepared and really fast.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Compared to other tools sometime the "query" in the scenario/campaign seems limited. Can happen that you need to create objects outside the scenario just to enable it.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our requirement was for a tool that could manage website personalization, email marketing, and reporting in one place, without the need for extensive integration efforts. Bloomreach proved to be the ideal solution as it allowed us to avoid the hassle of aligning different systems and accomplish everything seamlessly.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The functionality I like the most about Bloomreach is the ability to preview how the pages will look prior to publishing and the ability to seperate the content into different marketing channels based on the line of business. There is the ability to integrate the login with our company's SSO.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The out of the box components are minimal so we had to write custom content components to be used on the pages. The workflow is not easily customizable and there isn't a good way to group content to be published at the same time.

all_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach Engage has transformed our customer marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach Engage (or Exponea as they were previously known) represented a huge leap forward in our CRM capabilities - building campaigns and targeting both broad and very specific audience is intuitive and the functionality is powerful.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach has very advanced analytics and reporting functionality, but (unlike the campaign builder), it is not particularly intuitive. They are clearly working on this (with templates for common reports recently launched), but it can still feel very overwhelming.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Bloomreach to ensure we can speak with our B2B & B2C customers in a relevant, targeted way to drive sales. The detailed, event-based customer profiles mean we can target very precisely with attractive, commercially successful campaigns.

Very responsive and helpful support team who will often solve an issue o their own and just go here you go, which is really cool. Have been able to sort out most if not all of the problems we've been having.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
training could've been a bit better handled, there were a lot of bits within it that felt, more like ads for the software than an actual breakdown of the capabilities.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Getting a much stronger view of what the customer is doing and why they're doing it, then being able to goon and engage with the customer where they are with the language and content they respond to.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
- clear interface
- user friendliness
- good communication with support
- detailed segmentation and filtering - good targeting of subsequent campaigns
- lots of useful data
- reporting option
- the possibility of connecting various tools via API
- the possibility of sending Push notifications and SMS

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
- slower response when loading larger reports
- more complex understanding of metrics, aggregates and expressions
- sometimes worse copying campaigns to other accounts

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can better collect information about our customers, better target campaigns to them. We know what they are interested in, what they buy, what they look at, and therefore offer them communication that does not bother them, on the contrary, they require it. We also started using more channels. In addition to email, also push notifications and sms.

all_reviews.review_title: Best platform ever!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
- user friendly - I can easily navigate between the customer attributes and events
- it is easy to search for something specific (e.g. specific campaign event) that the customer received and I like that I am able to backtrack the problems in case we receive a customer complaint for example
- In case I don't have enough luck with finding out what went wrong, I can always contact Bloomreach support to help me out
- multiple options either for analyses (reports, funnels, trends, dashboards, segmentations...) or marketing communication (email, sms, push, ad audiences...)
- I like that we have the aggregates and expressions, which are often missing in other platforms

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I guess when you are used to work with SQL, you might think or find limitations, but I think these limitations are for the very special use case and even when you encounter limitations, you still might be able to have some kind of workaround around that problem.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
problems:
- conditions for segments not precise enough -> Bloomreach benefit: better and easier targeting of customers
- taking a long time to prepare (code) analyses -> Bloomreach benefit: easier and faster way to analyse whatever I want / need

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach connects your customer data to your marketing outreach seamlessly and dynamically, without needless meetings and emails between departments. It centralizes data and becomes a single source of truth,

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It can be complicated and requires quite a bit of dev work to connect it the various platforms. Sometimes, reporting can be slow and require lots of manual steps to build.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We handle large amounts of personal data and Bloomreach keeps us compliant by limiting the amount of data handling and making it easy to manage data access. It's also a powerful email automation tool that has endless triggers and scenarios we can set up.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The technical caphabilities. We're able to build many advanced stuf.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The asset manager could be better, would be nice to have video played from an email eg. And also if you made changes on one language eg. a CTA colour, you should be able to get that out to other language versions automatically.

And the namings for events eg. "purchase" item, is not intuitive. You need to be a technical user to learn this quick.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps us storing a lot of data for customer profiles, so that we can tailor communication way better. And build up emails and flow easily.

all_reviews.review_title: The best platform I've used for customer data/email marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Really easy to see segments and how they grow over time - which gives you a detailed insight into your audience.
Building segments is also very straight forward, as well as building and scheduling emails.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
When reporting over time, if I log information and then review it again later, it may change (I am going to contact BR about this).

Reporting also is a little complicated but I am trying to figure this out.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can easily see split test results which is helping us to see a decent insight into our audience and learn what to do in future. With previous platforms, we could not see this level of detail in order to set rules and make decisions about future communications.

all_reviews.review_title: I like Bloomreach (formerly Exponea) for its powerful analytics and easy-to-use interface.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
I'm really impressed with Bloomreach Engagement. The logic is easy to understand and the user-friendly UI/UX makes it really simple to use. What I really like is that it allows you to combine multiple data sources and apply logical operations to them. It opens up limitless possibilities for campaigns and analytics.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Getting onboarded to Exponea can be a bit of a challenge. It takes time to get a grip on tracked events and attributes and how they work within the platform. I think the Academy course should be free of charge.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm impressed with how Exponea easily combines different modules to create a powerful synergistic workflow for businesses. It's amazing how quickly campaigns can be created and user behavior evaluated.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is ideal for managing sophisticated multi-channel campaigns across different user segments. Scenarios are easy to set up with a little bit of training, they are able to be very complex allowing your company to achieve any goal you have set to achieve through CRM.

Also, how easy it is to create amazing-looking emails without the need for lots of in-depth design knowledge. They are simple to set up and run as part of campaigns.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The only thing I dislike is the learning curve when starting off with Exponea, however, they offer great online training sessions. These cover all of the basics as well as more advanced courses.

The Exponea team is also always on hand to offer support through their live chat or their knowledge centre

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach is helping us expand our onboarding and in-life CRM. As a service where we can't predict a customer's need, Bloomreach has allowed us to remain front of mind through targeted campaigns

all_reviews.review_title: I have been working with Bloomreach even before it became Bloomreach (it used to be called Exponea)
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
It is easy to use but difficult to master. Unlike other, cheaper alternatives, here you can/must do everything on your own (reports, segmentations, etc). This way it takes you longer to work with it, but you get more control.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Usually, it's small stuff, like saving e-mail templates with undefined variables is impossible.
Lately they added in a new update, that when you clone campaigns across workspaces, it switches all settings to default. I did not find it in any documentation and our campaigns ran for two months with incorrect tracking data.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mostly CRM, we send direct mail, e-mail, push notifications etc. We also use weblayers and experiments, but for these we hire an external company. By having it all underneath one program, we can better optimise and plan future campaigns.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Can be overwhelming for inexperienced users. There is little content regarding user onboarding in the app, and there are always multiple ways to do one thing. This means you need the knowledge to know which way is the best. Catalog imports sometimes lag, and their speed could be improved.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
If you need one Platform where all your Data and Customers will be stored and used for Email Marketing Campaigns -  Bloomreach is the right one.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is a great tool for every company which wants to collect a large amount of data, store it, analyze it and create content and campaigns based on those data. It is a versatile tool that gives you insight into every aspect of your business. It also covers many marketing channels, such as e-mail campaigns, automated scenarios with e-mails, text messages, and push notifications as well as integration with Facebook and Google ads manager.

all_reviews.review_title: brSM + My Perspective
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
I find Bloomreach's brSM platform to be intuitive and simple to use. Creating search and browse rules are done in a flash, and go-live quickly. I truly appreciate the superior level of Support we receive & when issues do arise, I find our DXM team to be excellent.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I would like to see improvements made to their Facet Management feature... currently, a lot of manual work is required to configure an ideal front-end UX. I'd also appreciate further enhancements be focused on their Insights tool! I'd like them to improve the manner in which we must create Activities when fixing search/category issues, so to more clearly realize the KPI benefits of these changes. It would also be wonderful if they could help online retailers like us, to solve the systematic cold-start issues we face, when it comes to the creation of new categories & their contents' ranked order.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Launching Bloomreach on all of our websites has helped improve our shoppers' Search & Browse UX, and decreased the volume of null searches we captured when using our previous partner. Our eComm teams can now easily control the display order of all categories & block, reorder our PLPs quickly. We now offer our customers'  much better Filters on all PLPs & a richer Search experience overall. When a shopper searches for 'blue pants', for example - her search experience renders perfectly, now physically displaying all products in the color she wants to see.
