all_reviews.review_title: Swiss army knife of marketing tools
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Since we have used Bloomreach for years, we have been able to implement more complex scenarios we created and get answers to questions that we had. With really simple integrations, we did it without major help from our developers. Now we are using Bloomreach mainly for our email marketing,  but also we use other stuff (SMS, FB messages, Custom Google Ads audience) to create automated multichannel campaigns. The best thing about Bloomreach is that we can create everything in one place in one tool. After the successful campaign, we can evaluate all results and if we succeed, we are just automating those scenarios again in Bloomreach. If we struggled with something, we got very quick and professional help from customer support

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The integration part of the product is a little bit harder compared to other tools. But don't get me wrong. If you're doing basic functions, it's ok (for example simple tracking of visits like in Google Analytics, etc.), but if you're working on a more complex task, you will need the help of your developers and Bloomreach support. Bloomreach does, however, have some great knowledge-based articles. In beginning, it's a little bit harder (time-consuming) but it's worth it in the end.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
As I mentioned earlier, we use Bloomreach, especially for email marketing. Before Boolmreach we used Mailchimp, but the automation part of Mailchimp was much harder. Once we integrated Bloomreach, we have been easily able to automate all campaigns and scenarios. Additionally, we also work with cart abandonment emails. In the past, we were not able to use additional data and personalization. Now we are able to trigger cart abandonment messaging for those who have left the cart with much richer personalization, and this is a great way to get those conversions. Also, we use other tools like web layers and banners which help us boost those conversions and leads from emails even more.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: Since we have used Bloomreach for years, we have been able to implement more complex scenarios we created and get answers to questions that we had. With really simple integrations, we did it without major help from our developers. Now we are using Bloomreach mainly for our email marketing,  but also we use other stuff (SMS, FB messages, Custom Google Ads audience) to create automated multichannel campaigns. The best thing about Bloomreach is that we can create everything in one place in one tool. After the successful campaign, we can evaluate all results and if we succeed, we are just automating those scenarios again in Bloomreach. If we struggled with something, we got very quick and professional help from customer support

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: The integration part of the product is a little bit harder compared to other tools. But don't get me wrong. If you're doing basic functions, it's ok (for example simple tracking of visits like in Google Analytics, etc.), but if you're working on a more complex task, you will need the help of your developers and Bloomreach support. Bloomreach does, however, have some great knowledge-based articles. In beginning, it's a little bit harder (time-consuming) but it's worth it in the end.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: As I mentioned earlier, we use Bloomreach, especially for email marketing. Before Boolmreach we used Mailchimp, but the automation part of Mailchimp was much harder. Once we integrated Bloomreach, we have been easily able to automate all campaigns and scenarios. Additionally, we also work with cart abandonment emails. In the past, we were not able to use additional data and personalization. Now we are able to trigger cart abandonment messaging for those who have left the cart with much richer personalization, and this is a great way to get those conversions. Also, we use other tools like web layers and banners which help us boost those conversions and leads from emails even more.

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea - A toolbox limited only by your imagination
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea is a fantastic tool with endless potential permutations and the ability to dissect and disseminate data throughout your organisation giving you that nirvana of single customer view and omnichannel experience along with all the other buzzwords marketers love to throw around.

Exponea is infinitely scalable, the API is very simple to work with and connects with pretty much anything with very little effort, even the most obscure software platforms, given the correct development, will be able to connect and communicate with Exponea.

Effectively you're given a blank sheet of paper and you use all of the tools within the toolbox to produce and create your CRM specifically for your business. It genuinely is an off-the-shelf software solution that morphs into a bespoke application for your business.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Exponea is sold as a 'tool for marketeers' and whilst that is true it should be noted that that is like me selling you the best car ever, taking you to the garage to pick it up and opening the door to a floor covered in parts and saying 'there you go the best car you'll ever drive'.

The point is that Exponea is a tremendously powerful toolbox that requires a lot of configuration and set-up for you to start experiencing the benefits it will bring to your business. That's not necessarily a bad thing but it's more to make you aware you won't be logging in and running reports and gaining insights from day 1 - unless you spend a ton of money on consultation or development to get you up and running before going live within your business.

There are a couple of basic limitations which I know they have in the pipeline, for example being able to view the specific email you sent to Customer X seems to be a stretch currently - which given the likes of MailChimp, Campaign Monitor etc all manage to do in one click seems a weird function to leave out. I mean why would you want to know what you sent to a specific customer wouldn't you rather see the generic template with a ton of dynamic code in it?!

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
I can only comment on Exponea but if you're considering it then go for it but be prepared for a total blank sheet experience that you'll build your own CRM/CDP from to obtain the single customer view experience.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Actually understanding our customers. We've currently only implemented the email triggers, campaigns etc and integrated it with our internal systems. However, we are about to embark on web layers and stretch the capabilities further. We have numerous API connections which is all adding to the view of our customers and starting to allow us to tailor experiences for our customer base.

Currently only scratching the surface but we have a clear plan and are confident Exponea is able to deliver on everything we need it to do.

As a data driven business having such tool is empowering our CRM department and improving our customers experience.

The platform is so advanced, it takes some time to upskill yourself, especially using Jinja, thankfully Bloomreach offers a few Plug and Play use cases allowing us to drive revenue quickly.

all_reviews.review_title: Complex, yet easy to use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
I like working in Exponea environment. Exponea shows a lot of flexibility when building various campaign scenarios, while it is still easy to use. Navigation is straightforward. Learning curve is pretty steep. You can build very sophisticated personalized marketing campaigns with this tool. Growing list of integrations with other marketing platforms is quite sufficient for us.

Consulting team has provided us with many useful insights and detailed advice. We are currently implementing recommendation module where they are  helping us setting up different machine learning models and explaining various features and their impact.

The support team is quick to respond and resolve any problems I encountered so far.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Sometimes I need to set up more advanced segmentation based on more events and aggregates at the same time. While the intuitive building environment usually helps, here it complicates the process a bit and the computation has to be divided into more sub-stages and aggregates.

It is hard to avoid cluttering of the environment with variables, segmentations and aggregates which are no longer needed. Some cleaning tools would be very useful.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
I would choose Exponea for my company again.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Majority of our campaigns through Exponea are email campaigns. In addition to that we run online display campaigns via FB ads and Google Ads integration. Currently we are starting with a web personalization and recommendation module. Important part of Exponea are reports, there are some predefined reports but also customizable reports which I regularly use to gain customer insights.

Bloomreach allows me to analyze our customer's activity in a well-structured way. Great product analytics, reports, prediction and customer journey automation. Additionally, the tracking and profile merging allows me to combine more tracking data sources to empower our customer journey more visibly.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It's hard from the beginning to get used to the navigation. However, with all of the benefits I get from using this product, it is definitely worth the initial effort and learning. Documentation helps.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
My recommendation is to always ask for feedback from other Bloomreach customers. Once you hear that feedback, you will be sure that this is the right product for you. The level of consciousness you will get in your direct marketing after Bloomreach installation cannot be compared with any other martech.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach is helping me always to have a clear and easy-to-utilize tracking history of all of the customer's actions. Sometimes I need to analyze website actions, personalize the website, and also be able to contact customers, depending on their current state proactively. Bloomreach facilitates all of these things.

review_question_answers.answer: Better data management and combined channel streams - puts more control in the hands of marketers.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Toolbox of Data
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The flexibility of the software is second to none, you are only limited by your imagination really and obviously the expertise to execute it!

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Some basic things such as being able to view the email you've sent to the customer - this is basic functionality that exists in all kinds of tools such as MailChimp, Campaign Monitor and more relevant HubSpot. So far it seems to not be available which is a bit of a miss.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
If you enter into this software with your eyes wide open you'll have a fantastic toolbox that is as flexible as anything I've used in 30years. Just be aware that it is a toolbox, you need to construct the bits and pieces to make it really fly. But don't despair the level of support is absolutely fantastic and hasn't let me down yet.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Numerous. The ability to view our customers interactions with the business and being able to act on that, reduction in time administrating data, running reports etc Time saving is probably the biggest benefit to date

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Project manager and senior data analyst

all_reviews.review_title: Ultimate marketing tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Complexity - every created tool/segment/campaign can be used for every activity. There is no limit for Exponea. We are using probably just 50 % of Exponea potential. Exponea has great customer support - every single time they were very friendly and they helped us with any problem - very proactive and professional. I love creating dashboard from any report/funnels etc. - every needed information in one place thanks to dashboards. Flows can be pretty useful. Surveys are the best - you can connect their results to any automatic scenarious and interact immediately with selected customers.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Sometimes it is too difficult to define some reports - there is really a lot of option and sometimes it is not very user friendly. The price is pretty expensive - suitable only for pretty big companies (out small company is exception I think). I cant rely on funnels - almost every single time it shows different results than what report shows me (mayby my fault but I cant figgured it out where is the problem). Automatic banner/email conversion evaluation isnt the top :) Survey evaluations could be a bit easier.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Helpdesk is soemtimes a bit confused for me. At least some filtres in datadeletion would be nice for every pricing - would be nice if exponea would be a bit more customer cost friendly.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer segmentation, automatic campaigns, reporting for company owners, realizing "one-time campaigns" like newsletters. Thanks to Exponea we are able to better identify potential business leaks and we can find new opportunities thanks to automatic survey results connected to another automatic campaigns.
Benefits are especially financial impacts on our business and it gives us great overview about it.

all_reviews.review_title: All in one
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Elaborate templating language usable in almost all of the features. Especially combination with webhooks and scenarios is very powerful, allowing us to connect with any API and programmatically process the data. This setup solves many tasks that would otherwise require some microservice to be developed. It also helps with the transition from marketers to technologists/developers.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The recommendation feature could have gotten more prioritization. So far, the computation/learning time is really long and often not successful. When it's combined with a few bugs discovered along the way, even getting to the testing phase takes a long time. I see a huge potential there once it works smoothly.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
CRM campaigns automation, execution, analytics & their data integrations. Have it all in one seems like a biggest benefit to me. I'v seen quite few solutions from thre competitors and there is always something missing.

Bloomreach is a smart, intuitive system that allows our marketing team to target customers at the correct moment to maximize sales. Their support team is fantastic and very helpful. Anytime I have a question I can just pop in the live chat feature and a dedicated rep will help solve any issues we're experiencing. It could not be easier!

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There really isn't anything I dislike about Bloomreach. Everything works as advertized.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were very dependent on our in-house development team to implement changes and tests to our email marketing flow. That process was slow and cumbersome. Bloomreach has empowered the marketing team to make changes on their own, quickly and conveniently. We can be more flexible and adjust quicker to changing dynamics.

all_reviews.review_title: flexible and easy to use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Its very easy to setup and maintain many shops. The moderators or content creators don't need to be highly trained or IT experts. After a short training session (~2h) they are able to work with it.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There is room for possible improvements to make the creators' job even easier. The documents for a page (contents of components) could be sorted alphabetically rather than by creation date. The selection of documents for a component should be filtered for documents that are appropriate for the component.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Easy and fast setup of new shops and pages. All this can be done nearly without the help of IT. Changes can be made in minutes and we can show our customers content based on different characteristics.

all_reviews.review_title: Really Great and data rich CDP platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
There is a lot of customer information to help you manage and inform decision-making for your marketing channel.  I enjoy the fact that you can find almost everything you need in one place. The guide documents are pretty self explanatory and can help you if you get stuck with creating reports, segments, or measuring the success of a campaign you are running. You can integrate other third-party platforms and API's seamlessly, which is a nice plus.

I really like the scenario feature, which allows you to build complex and detailed customer journeys. I also like that you can amend a live campaign without having to stop or pause a scenario.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I am still exploring, so I don't have a lot of dislikes. Although I felt a bit let down with issues around GA tracking and also a few lengthy processes with setting up my campaign reporting.

After using the platform for several months, I still dont have a lot of negatives about the platform.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
It is a really great platform with a lot of information which is very useful. I highly recommend the platform for anyone considering it.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Its easier to build my email campaigns and track the performance of my campaigns. This has made my team a lot more productive, saving time in their day-to-day work. Better customer segmentation which means we are sending more relevant campaigns to achieve better email campaign stats.

all_reviews.review_content:

Using Bloomreach is very helpful. We have the whole database in one place. In the past, we couldn't reach synergies between classical retail and e-commerce because we had no global view on customer activities.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There are not many things we dislike. We are pleased to have and use the solution. Time to time we missed the opportunity to use native integration with local endpoint providers (email, sms).

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bloomreach helps us deal with customer database segmentation, omnichannel active file monitoring, advanced marketing automation scenarios, personalized emailing, and SMS. It's also great to connect our advertising accounts from Google and Facebook to create and match new audiences.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The customer support team is the strongest highlight for me. They're always quick to respond, seem passionate to help, and know what they're doing compared to their competitors

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The Exponea platform has a few missing features and un-intuitive decisions for its interface, which is quite annoying. Such as the lack of auto-save while editing emails, lack of support for more than one person working within a scenario, a limit to the number of custom rows shown, unable to set different mobile and desktop styling easily (padding, font sizes, etc.), unable to define a color palette or text styles, unable to set the height of sections, unable to format the text of icons (bold, italics).

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reports have been beneficial for us to understand how our email campaigns are performing and why they're performing that way through the heatmaps. The features allowing personalization offer a lot of opportunities as well which we're starting to explore further

The combination of customer attributes and events (e.g., email campaigns or purchase events) leads to a very powerful and relatively easy-to-use marketing tool. In addition the Live Chat help is very useful and reliable.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
In the implementation process, we were not quoted a sufficient number of consulting hours however, working with the team, we were able to come to a mutually beneficial compromise and working with the helpful consultant reached a satisfactory solution.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
We have integrated Bloomreach (Exponea) into a custom-built SCV database to maximize the potential of the tool

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
A better understanding of our customers from a multitude of data sources and a better quality of email marketing campaigns targeted. This has resulted in a greater quality of email send, an increase in database size and a large delivery rate/click-through rate. The tool is increasing our ability to attribute email send to actual purchases of our products.

all_reviews.review_title: Awesome tool everything a modern marketing team needs in 1 tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The main reason why we were so drawn to Exponea was that in some form or another we were already employing these features--just from multiple suppliers, where obviously the data was all very siloed, and holistically speaking it wasn't particularly useful. Having everything under one roof was a focus, and Exponea's version of each feature is pretty much as good, if not better than the other individual tools of the past. We haven't really started fully using Exponea, but the ability to build detailed reports, and off the back of those reports be able to contact customers, segment them, and direct these data reports--this is really nice! Also, to provide a consistent, personalized message online, and email across various touchpoints is the holy grail we are planning to put into use soon. The team is brilliant, too, can't praise them enough. I've had a great time, one of the most enjoyable large-scale projects that we've done! Nothing was too much of a problem, it was fantastic to work together. Once the project was implemented, they asked me if we can say anything we'd like to do better, and I honestly couldn't think of anything. And that annoyed them, 'cause they wanted to know how they could improve. They've just been fantastic!

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Not much really it takes some getting used to in the way that it collets data which can limit some reporting. But its this method that give it its strength.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
If you're looking for a reduce your techstack, definitely give Exponea a go, not just for the technology but the awesome team that comes with it. The early signs are very promising, we still have a lot of work ahead of us to leverage Exponea's many features, though it will mostly involve testing and trying until we see what fits. For example, by following one of Exponea's recommendations, we launched an email campaign for our top performing customers where we removed our sales banner from the email, so they didn't get any notifications, and it still drove 4x more orders than all the other emails we sent out.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Removing siloed data, spending less time building reports, and a lot more time being actionable based off the insights provided by reports--which is great! Sending consistent messages was key for us, making sure that any on-site or email personalisation we sent out provided the same, consistent message to each person. In addition, Exponea solved some problems we didn't know we had. We didn't look at ways to segment customers based on their lifecycle, and that we could run campaigns with these segments. Also, there was some helpful documentation, which pointed us in the right direction, where we were already implementing certain strategies regarding personalisation across on-site, email and direct mail.

all_reviews.review_title: Gather Real Insights with Exponea
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The ability to A/B test front-end features that produce results based on revenue. This validates and shapes our decisions, whether it's on development and future work of the website, or tracking performance within our e-commerce team. We can gather real insights and make decisions efficiently and effectively.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
While the app is very user-friendly, I would potentially like to see a javascript course developed for support within the Experiments and Tag Manager tools.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can now target our customers based on our RFM models and personalized emails. This allows us to be able to send offers best-suited for results. The ability to segment customers has been made easy following Exponea guidance. I've been with the business less than 12 months and now have a great grasp of the Exponea app and the power of its capabilities. Thanks for the support, Exponea team!

Single customer view which is easy to access & manipulate without any coding.
Easy to build marketing automation & Web layer scenarios based on data.
Great slack community... i usually get a response within minutes.
Brilliant sales team. Very transparent. Facilitated the whole end-to-end process smoothly.
Brilliant implementation team- Very patient, knowledgable, innovative & supportive.
Brilliant CSM- great service so far. Very supportive & quick response times. Also has product knowledge which is a plus.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
No out of box starter pack dashboards.
No gamification overlays yet.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Its a beast of a tool but when you understand the layers within it, it's the best I have worked with so far.

Make sure you have people with data backgrounds as part of the product selection process.

Understanding value of Leads has helped us tweek our Lead to 1st purchase strategies.
Understanding what drives our new customers has informed our acquisition strategy for this year.

all_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach offers a solution which is intuitive and powerful.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The UI is informative, and the toolset is easy to use. You can do a lot with the solution, for example, reporting and email communication. Compared to other solutions, the data is more prosperous, as it connects with how customers behave.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I don't like that the email template system is either custom all the way (but not very fun to use) or restricted with default code skeleton (but easy-to-use) drag-and-drop UI.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Bloomreach has an excellent set of academy courses available for anyone interested in learning the platform. They genuinely help get to know the system regardless of the type of work you will be doing with the Bloomreach solution.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Bloomreach solution, we can reach the customers in real-time and give them a personalized experience according to their lifecycle. Our clients' business performance has gone up since utilizing Bloomreach.

all_reviews.review_title: Broad product scope and a friendly and helpful team!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
We like the scope of Exponea's capabilities. We can create the scenarios we need and target the right audiences easily. The user interface is nice to work with, and looks clean. We're also happy with the quality and quantity of product documentation, which makes it easier to use the platform. And Exponea Academy has been very helpful for getting us up to speed with Exponea quickly. Last but definitely not least, we're very happy with the Exponea team - they're very friendly and always willing to help.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Although the documentation goes over the most commonly used use cases, it would be nice to have those as predefined templates in the actual product. We would like to have more templates for the most common email campaigns, scenarios, and use cases. It would be nice to only have to click a button and implement a use case. The documentation and Exponea Academy are a good substitute for now, but that's what we would like to see changed.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Exponea to manage all our email campaigns to our database, and it's been great for that. Since we help with the development of young people, we often need to get consent from their parents before they come to our events or complete applications for our programs on our website. Exponea helps us manage and track consents, and only send messages to the right people.

all_reviews.review_title: Extremely powerful tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach has an incredibly powerful set of analytics and segmentation tools, facilitating deep, meaningful understanding of our customer data. It's easy to create highly targeted, trigger-based automations to help achieve our business goals. Overall, it's an extremely versatile tool (one of the most flexible CRM/ESPs that I've ever used) that offers a huge array of customisation over how you use it.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Due to its high level of customization, it can be very complex to understand how to use the various elements of Bloomreach to begin with. Even simple reporting and data analysis can be pretty complicated until you've gained a good understanding of the reports, aggregates, running aggregates, segmentation tools, etc. I've been using the tool almost daily for approximately 4 months, and there are still elements that I struggle to completely understand. However, I do get a good level of support from my CSM and support team.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Bloomreach as our ESP to create and send all BAU and service emails. We also use it to create complex, highly targeted trigger-based email and SMS automations throughout the customer lifecycle, as well as to personalise the on-site user experience through weblayers and experiments. It's also our central CRM reporting tool; we use it to create customer segmentations and reports, to help understand our shopper base. These segments also feed into our digital ads taregeting across display and social.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Many tools are deployed in order to complete a B2C or C2B transaction and its a big pain point to unify the consumer journey across different systems and visualise it and drive actionables out of it. The capability of Bloomreach to unify these different tools' backend data stacks and empower business to create campaigns which drive conversions at different dropoff points in the journey is unparalleled.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Visualisations of different paths taken by consumer between start and end points of a journey.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Campaigns optimised based on conversion metrices.
End to end funnel analysis and identification of gap areas.

Incredibly powerful and flexible enough for our complex needs - Bloomreach replaces two separate ESPs we were using before, one for newsletters, one for complex automations with bespoke use cases as an e-commerce marketplace.

all_reviews.review_title: We are making effective decisions with Bloomreach
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
What I like the most is the support and guidance, and constant striving to make our business working better for our customers (and us). This is what the team at Bloomreach drives and constantly delivers. I love that Bloomreach allows us the ability to A/B test features that produce results based on revenue. This helps to validate and shape decision-making, whether it is on the future development of the website, or tracking statistics within the e-commerce team. We can gather the insights that we need efficiently and make necessary decisions effectively.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
One of the very few things our team dislikes about Bloomreach involves javascript. Having more javascript support for our team from the support team would be helpful.

With Bloomreach's guidance, the problem of segmenting customers is no longer an issue. It is now easy to segment customers for us. We can send offers tailored for optimal results. We can customize experiences for our customers and make decisions based on analytics.

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea/Bloomreach Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The intuitive & user-friendly design of the system makes even the most complicated of tasks much more manageable.

Having the freedom to input additional data aggregates/expressions to improve our targeting & reporting is incredibly valuable.

The flexibility & power of the tool, showing the customers at each different point of a journey/scenario & being able to easily manipulate it based on what you see.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The reporting tools are incredibly powerful, but setting up some of the metrics with more advanced formulae can be slightly complicated & requires second & third checks.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Bloomreach as our CDP & execute all of our CRM activity through here. We're increasing the real-time functionality in phases so we can better communicate with our customers.

Having all of our data (segmentation & reporting) in one location is incredibly beneficial and allows us to have complete control over what customers receive & when they receive it.

all_reviews.review_title: A great Email/Omnichannel Marketing platform, 360-degree view with a highly supportive team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea is super easy to learn and set up.

UI - The login process is easy and setting up user profiles is very simple on the UI.

Email marketing features-  Awesome A/B features, dynamic content features, prediction module, retrieving past edited history, creating complex scenarios. I also like the click map under evaluation which helps in understanding where the customer clicked the most, and how he/she has hovered the email.

Bulk emails - Support large volume emails.

Data Integration - Support all types of file imports and API connections.

Nurture Campaigns- You can lead score or segment your audience easily and tie them to a nurture campaign to give them exactly what they want to run through + can use predictions too for such cases.

Live support team - Very experienced and knowledgeable support team and always ready for help. They dig deeper inside a query, offer great tips and advice for further optimisation, and you can get any question answered really fast + guide you in a step by step process to accomplish any specific task.

Account Manager - Happy to assist help with our account. During implementation, their team worked closely with us to ensure that we were following best practices and we get the best out of the product

Life Cycle Mngt - For creating life cycle marketing features based on customer transactions, behaviour, user activity etc. Explicit RFM Dashboard.

Exponea Academy - Amazing and dedicated team of professionals who will ensure no student leaves without learning.

Collection data points- One can through a preference centre or other sources can create various customer attributes, that offers an enriching insight into who our audiences are.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
1) There could be more email templates for ready use. Good to include a countdown banner for emails too. Customizing certain elements with JavaScript or CSS can be confusing at times when one is not a pro.

2) Exponea is not good for surveys. You don't get automatic dashboards as in the case of Typeform or Survey Monkey.

3) Working with aggregates and running aggregates can be complex.

4) Web layers is complex. Designing is quite an easy part but deployment on the website requires knowledge of JS and technical expertise.

5) Since Exponea business consultants are highly involved with other clients too, their availability can take up some time, which can be time lost for an organisation. On the contrary, the live support is always available and quick in their response.

6) Advance course should also include knowledge of how to use predictions in real-life cases.

7) Recommendation should offer more meaningful reports and insights.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automating email nurture and sending bulk emails, Data Hygiene, Funnel management, Collecting unique data points and having Exonea as a source of truth. We are now working to start sending out transactional emails from Exponea. We are still in the phase of exploiting Exponea to its maximum capacity. So far, the benefits I realized are that Exponea can have the Marketing Approach, Analytical Insights and its Strategic ways. Also, the Marketing Campaigns and Initiatives are very helpful in organizing these activities as well as to see a clear definite marketing effort in the end. Exponea is one centralised system for all marketing campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Great product for business!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The flexibility of the system and its fairly understandable interface help a lot. Bloomreach functionality and technical connectivity to other systems and providers solve the tasks set for the system.
If you have been working with similar products for a long time, then it will be very easy for you to get used to it and get started.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
We have requests in the settings of detailed selections for data that are now being transferred to Bloomreach, but as it turned out, there are certain limitations in their use. For example, it is not possible to simply and accurately configure the consolidation of data on adjacent objects that we transfer. We have already spent a lot of time creating catalogs, but so far we have not managed to solve our problem with the required quality. Perhaps this concerns the specifics of our practices, but we believe that this request may arise from most companies in the Russian market.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use this product to increase loyalty to our company and you know it's simple. It is very flexible and easy to set up and carry out the necessary research, and in case of difficulties, partners from Bloomreach will promptly help. Efficiency in resolving issues and difficulties is very important for us, since our processes are very dynamic and cost $.
We, like most other companies, use different products, and what's cool is that Bloomreach has built-in connectors that will allow you to connect them simply and in a short time. If you have no experience with this platform, this is also not a problem, since they can conduct training for you, where they will tell you in detail and give practice about working with it.

all_reviews.review_title: Helped us solve multiple disconnected sources of data and marketing platforms
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The ability to take all of our existing data sources from various other platforms / disconnected marketing tools and have the data all flow into one central customer view.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Implementation did take us longer than expected. However, this was primarily due to internal complexities regarding getting support with integrating all of our existing data sources and platforms to Exponea.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Ensure you have adequate developer resource internally, so that you can be quick to act when you need to integrate your various existing marketing systems/platforms.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a brand with multiple sources of fragmented omnichannel data, it was becoming increasingly difficult to achieve a single customer view.
We have now managed to consolidate our data into one single view, and then trigger/perform marketing campaigns from the data.

all_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach is a fantastic platform all-around
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The thing I like most about Bloomreach is the ability to execute omnichannel campaigns from a central starting point and control all elements of the process with a complete overview of every customer. In totality, the Bloomreach platform is fantastic. It is intuitive and straightforward to use with many excellent features. The support provided by the Bloomreach team is also excellent, and the live chat help desk team is brilliant at resolving issues quickly and effectively.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The thing that I dislike about Bloomreach is how biased out-of-the-box reporting is on campaigns and A/B testing. For example, I need to be able to change the A/B test on the results page of a scenario. Really the only downside to Bloomreach is the relative infancy of the platform can sometimes still be felt in the tool. Some small things can make some tasks cumbersome. I feel that some of these things could have been fixed before rolling out a few of the bigger features.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
I would recommend having someone on the team fluent in Jinja as early in the process as possible. They offer academy courses that helped improve our skills in using Bloomreach and Jinja later on. These are costs on top of the contract but worth paying.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
The company is solving problems we had with omni-channel campaigns and A/B testing. We now better understand our customers needs which is very important for our business.

all_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach is a great platform that brings good value
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
What I like best about Bloomreach is the real-time event tracking, the user-friendly interface, and the helpful and friendly support team. I also love that Bloomreach is committed to constantly improving and that new features are always being introduced.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
On occasion, I find that Bloomreach's documentation may not be sufficient to supplement the features or complete the integration of a certain portion of the product. There are certain technical limitations that would take some considerable time to have been implemented.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
I recommend that others be prepared with a detailed list of requirements and be ready to roll out the new email sender, as Bloomreach is integrated with the limited number of them (Mailgun, etc.). I also recommend purchasing the tech consulting hours during the implementation stage to avoid issues or to avoid falling into pitfalls.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving a multitude of problems with Bloomreach. Omni-channel campaign management has become easy to implement and benefit from since we have started using Bloomreach. Showing banners on our website and in our mobile app has become much easier and it has also become easier to send browser/mobile push notifications if a user has left our platform recently. Bloomreach has assisted us in effectively sending emails and SMS messages and adding users to a retargeting campaign if they stopped engaging with previous messaging. A/B testing and customer data management is also made much easier now with Bloomreach. Having a 360-degree customer view is very valuable.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: What I like best about Bloomreach is the real-time event tracking, the user-friendly interface, and the helpful and friendly support team. I also love that Bloomreach is committed to constantly improving and that new features are always being introduced.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: On occasion, I find that Bloomreach's documentation may not be sufficient to supplement the features or complete the integration of a certain portion of the product. There are certain technical limitations that would take some considerable time to have been implemented.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
review_question_answers.answer: I recommend that others be prepared with a detailed list of requirements and be ready to roll out the new email sender, as Bloomreach is integrated with the limited number of them (Mailgun, etc.). I also recommend purchasing the tech consulting hours during the implementation stage to avoid issues or to avoid falling into pitfalls.

Bloomreach has assisted us in effectively sending emails and SMS messages and adding users to a retargeting campaign if they stopped engaging with previous messaging. A/B testing and customer data management is also made much easier now with Bloomreach. Having a 360-degree customer view is very valuable.

all_reviews.review_title: Future-Thinking CDP Solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
What's great?
- Customization options are essentially endless.
- Personalization and AI help us serve more relevant offers.
- The on-demand chat support is amazing. These folks are not just customer support people, but knowledgeable solutions engineers, with tech backgrounds.

What's good?
- We can leverage the Exponea API to plug all of our communication channels into the CDP for cross-channel data tracking.
- The onboarding team is pretty helpful, and the account managers are strategic and accessible.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
What's bad?
- There were some snags during the onboarding process, likely due to the acquisition that occurred soon after our contract start date. Bloomreach acquired Exponea, and so our onboarding, account, and support team got shuffled around a few times. Thus, communication was not as great as it could have been.
- We dealt with a few data processing latency issues early on, which were attributed to overuse of our shared instance. Imports and events were delayed.

What could be better?
- A better log of the onboarding process that updates as it changes.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
- We've been able to consolidate our CRM communication channels.
- We're able to have a better view of CRM attribution.
- We can personalize our CRM and web experiences.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Potential but you need to know what you're doing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach offers excellent opportunities to tailor offers and messaging on your website and in your communication to the customers' interests.
The interface is easy, and once you grasp the logic, things can be edited and adapted quickly.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It is crucial that the set-up is made correctly and that the relevant data properties are tracked or exported to Bloomreach.
The support staff, while available and competent, are mostly tech-people and as a business user, it's not always easy to convey to them the problem you're having. It is a definite advantage to be at least familiar with scripting or to have an implementation partner who can translate the business requirements into a more technical vocabulary.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Bloomreach to make relevant product recommendations to our online shop visitors and recipients of our newsletters. The newsletters themselves are also composed and sent out through Bloomreach. More solutions such as push messaging and personalisation are planned but not yet implemented.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The tool Exponea does a pretty good job and contains a lot of options (from email campaigns to web layers). I like that you have really many options in one tool, so you can join more steps together. Like creating scenarios, these are perfect. You track about customers step by step what you need and design the communication exactly in the right moment and right conditions. Or at least what you think these could be. :D

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I don't know what to dislike because I don't know your entire portfolio. So maybe the fact that I don't have cognizance of all your services. :) But if it is quite the same, then I really have som big issue uising your tools.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
From my experience, it is an excellent tool for mail campaigns and A/B tests of all the parts of your web (from simple pop-ups to the whole landing page). You can easily set conditions for every communication you create. Also, the fact that it is an omnichannel tool is notable. When you target some customers with the campaign, you can continue with some push notification, SMS, or web layer on the website and vice versa.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
The mail campaigns and A/B test through the whole web. It's easy to set and also to evaluate these are the most significant benefits. And what's even easier is connect these actions and learnings from them to even better communication.

all_reviews.review_title: A fantastic, feature-rich, versatile tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea has lots of built-in tools to make good use of your customer data, such as communication (email, push, SMS); personalisation (on-site banners, recommendations); predictions and modeling; analysis and segmentation; and complex scenario building.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There are minor frustrations like the way you send data works in one situation but not another.  For example, the way we send product data with each purchase works for customisation (e.g., in emails) but not for analysis (e.g., was this order single or multi-category?). However, Exponea's live chat team is incredibly helpful and will help you find the right solution or workaround. In the case of the product data, the team helped me figure out a way to send the data that would support both personalisation and analysis.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're merging customer data from previously disconnected sources and finally giving ourselves the ability to act on that data. We have our apps, our website, and our back-end data connected in a single platform. The data are accurate, real-time, and show the full customer view no matter how they interact with the brand. We understand more than we previously did about our customers, faster and more efficiently than before. We can subsequently act on that data rapidly and effectively, choosing the correct communication method for each customer, respectively.

all_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach gives you more execution with less IT
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Bloomreach is a product that basically is limitless. I kept generating different ideas that were not out-of-the-box functions of the platform and never once did the support team tell me that the platform was not capable of doing that. The support team is always able to provide a solution because the platform works with all tools and the data-driven employees function on a highly technical level. Bloomreach is very agile and incredibly dynamic. The requirements can be implemented in a timeframe that is reasonable for everyone. We have enjoyed working with the experts from Bloomreach and the platform offers seemingly endless capabilities to our team. It shows in our numbers that our customers have enjoyed us going with Bloomreach.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I know that the team at Bloomreach is constantly working on documentation because the platform is always evolving. But I do think that the documentation can be more extensive at different places. Getting so many great different possibilities does require you to spend some time diving into the platform a bit deeper to get a knowledge base of things. Things that are not necessarily.a part of the daily business. This can put more tasks on all members of the team but does help to build knowledge. The more knowledge you have, the more effectively you can use Bloomreach.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
The main benefit that we are realizing is that we can now executive highly personalized campaigns more rapidly. We have optimized our conversion rates by pinpointing our targeted segments through ram storage and tracking diversity. We have significantly increased our productivity and we have done this without having to rely on our IT team. Using weblayers and experiments has allowed us to see a significant reduction in the manual work for the content department. This is because of the different opportunities that Bloomreach's marketing automation offers us. In addition, we are really seeing some success with the omni-channel communication efforts with our base of users. We have a significantly better open rate thanks to Bloomreach because the message is reaching each customer at the best time for it to be opened.

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea is an outstanding reporting tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
What strikes everyone in our company is how incredibly fast it is. It is much faster than Google Analytics. The greatest thing for us is how it fits everything together and gives us a more complete overview of the customer. We were limited to transactional data previously. We can now look at behavioral data of customers and aggregate it and put it in reports or segment it. It is really fast to set up reports. The fact that we can enrich events with attributes that we like is fantastic. When you find a segment in Google Analytics, it's really hard to do something with it. We can choose to target customers through multpile channels right away with Exponea. It is intuitive.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
People who aren't used to setting up reports find it a bit intimidating at times. Because it is so extensive and versatile, it can seem overwhelming at first attempts to some. You can set up reports in a lot of ways. There are ways that you get lost in all of the different options and settings, but the customer support that Exponea has is really great. They answer fast, they answer correctly and they always help us. When we hit a wall, the feature is raised with the development team. Since it is so powerful, flexible and vast, it takes some time before you know what you're doing. But once you get past that obstacle, it is extremely powerful.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Getting a full view of the customer in one system instead of having bits and pieces in different systems and reports, and being able to take immediate actions upon those findings and segmentations. The instant reports because it is so fast. In real-time we can now follow sales. There is no lag. We can monitor campaigns with all of the data that we need. We use it not only with the sales team, but we also share reports with purchasers, branding marketeers and staff higher up in the organization as well. They get reports and dashboards they can follow easily.

Integrated survey module allow for better understanding consumer behavior. Webhooks response can be stored within the scenario therefore unlocking even more opssiblitis. What I also like is that there are attibues on event level not only on customer level. Easy to use sementation (no need for additional attribues for segments) and they can also easily be used in reportind as a dimension.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Even though reporting is advanced in the reports section, some practice is needed to have the right data in the report as filtering order is not very clear.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We almost do not need developers for marketing (apart from initial set-up) as this tool is robust!

all_reviews.review_title: Bloomreach has fast analytics and reporting
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The thing that I like most about Bloomreach (formerly Exponea) is that when you have quality data, you can do a lot of things very quickly with it. This includes analyses, reports, and segmentations. The support team always provides an immediate answer to virtually any question. I can create a report in about 30 seconds and as you can imagine, this saves us a lot of time. It is the next step to getting more value out of Bloomreach. Webhooks and APIs open up an entire new world of possibilities. For a marketer with a background in IT, Bloomreach is absolutely incredible. What we can track as an event (every click, every scroll, every customer action) is very comprehensive.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
One of the things that I wish was a little bit better about Bloomreach is the documentation. There is a lot that you can do with weblayers but you do need to have a good level of knowledge.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
What I would tell people who are considering Bloomreach? Do not take it lightly. It is a fantastic idea to allocate a team for implementation and preparation. Bloomreach is just as good as the data you possess. It is not a software that you can just set up once and you are done with it forever. It is necessary to have someone who is active and works with Bloomreach often. I definitely recommend Bloomreach consultancy hours and the Academy. I saw a little more benefit in the consultancy hours.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are definitely using Bloomreachh to make some improvements. We are currently using the platform for simple segmentation of our customers. This is a much more simple way of evaluating our campaigns as I can now perform analytics very quickly. I have access to data and reports so when I have colleagues from different teams approach me, I can easily give them the answers that they need. We are using email scenarios with dynamic content. We are able to recommend products for the customer and get the product name in the subject for the customer as well as the price after the discount. We are seeing great success with this with Bloomreach.

all_reviews.review_title: Great platform to help make data-driven business decisions
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea is a CDP, ESP and BI platform in one. Exponea is great if you want everything connected and make your data actionable. For example you can create reports and segmentations to understand who your top customers are, and then automatically use this data to segment your email campaigns as well as use the segments as LAL audiences for your social campaigns or create custom web experiences based on their order history.
Exponea allows you to automate a lot of processes from email marketing campaigns to reporting that will save your team a lot of time.
Something I love about Exponea is that you understand the customer's journey before they make a purchase. Such as how often a customer visited your site before they make a purchase or what acquisition channel triggered the customer to come to your website for the first time. This is valuable data to build an advanced attribution model.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There is not a lot I dislike about Exponea. Something I wish would be better is reporting on a product level. Exponea works great for order-level reporting but is not ideal for product-level reporting as each product is a separate purchase event.
In addition, I wish it would be possible to add data from a data table such as product details based on SKU number or budget totals to add to the reports.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Through Exponea I know who our top customers are in real-time and I can use this data to create custom prospect audiences and email segmentation.
Exponea allows me to understand our CLTV and retention rate and track these KPIs in real-time to ensure that they are improving over time.
With Exponea we are saving time when creating email campaigns through the easy to use drag-and-drop feature when designing an email through creating automated email segmentation.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer:
Exponea is a CDP, ESP and BI platform in one. Exponea is great if you want everything connected and make your data actionable. For example you can create reports and segmentations to understand who your top customers are, and then automatically use this data to segment your email campaigns as well as use the segments as LAL audiences for your social campaigns or create custom web experiences based on their order history.
Exponea allows you to automate a lot of processes from email marketing campaigns to reporting that will save your team a lot of time.
Something I love about Exponea is that you understand the customer's journey before they make a purchase. Such as how often a customer visited your site before they make a purchase or what acquisition channel triggered the customer to come to your website for the first time. This is valuable data to build an advanced attribution model.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer:
There is not a lot I dislike about Exponea. Something I wish would be better is reporting on a product level. Exponea works great for order-level reporting but is not ideal for product-level reporting as each product is a separate purchase event.
In addition, I wish it would be possible to add data from a data table such as product details based on SKU number or budget totals to add to the reports.

all_reviews.review_title: Versatile platform with user collaborative updates and friendly service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
We have been using Exponea for a few years now, after making the switch from one of its competitors. Exponea was in its youth at the time and I feel like our feedback has really been taken on board to help to shape the platform it has become. It has been very easy to get in touch with feedback, which is listened to and used to continually improve the platform. We have had great account managers and developers, who are very knowledgeable, easy to get hold of and always willing to help. The live chat is also a great tool to quickly receive responses on quick queries.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The visual builder, whilst great and very easy to use, can be a little restrictive. It it is served by a third party company and so it can difficult to get information when the system is down or if there are any issues.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
It is a very versatile and user-centric platform with friendly reps who really listen to and action feedback. There are regular platform updates, with an itemised breakdown of every new feature.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is very quick and easy build emails and to see how the emails are performing - including any issues which might appear. We are also working closely with Exponea to create tests to serve better emails, to improve our use of available functionality and to optimise our open, click through and  bounce rates.

all_reviews.review_title: Digital marketing is happening right here, right now - Spectacular tool Exponea - ALL IN ONE PLACE!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea helps us to fill our inside data with website data and we can work with them afterward! The best tool ever. Honestly, it is stunning every day open Exponea, and everything that comes up on my mind I can design it here. I had a few sessions with trainees and had also a few academy lessons on how to use this tool to be completely sure, that I know how to work with Exponea properly.


Exponea helps us to fill our inside data with website data and we can work with them afterward! It is a great tool for multi-platform communication including email delivering oversight features and they are stunning! I love how easy you can plan email campaigns for specific customers, customer segments. You can trigger by time, event category, etc. . It is also very helpful to see how many customers really open emails and how many of them click on links in the email. It gives me great feedback and helps me to understand how to attract them and what is their motivation. I use scenarios a lot and I can tell you that it is spectacular how timesaving is this awesome tool.

However, I know that there are lots of online CRM systems on market, but as a professional, I can tell you that Exponea made me stand This is absolutely amazing.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Nothing. Exponea works completely fine without any troubles. I  have never seen such a tool before. I was so amazed about tools in Exponea you can use in the travel business/industry. Travel business is so dynamic these days and you need to be really concentrated what you are doing and Exponea also helped us with this.


Customer support of Exponea is awesome, always there when I need them. 1st year with Exponea was difficult because we needed to set up everything correctly to be completely sure, that everything is running smoothly and correctly. We are running Exponea for 2nd year now and it was very helpful during the Covid-19 pandemic. We had lots of ideas on how to help our customers in communication with our customer department or claims and also a few scenarios that might help us with revenues in these hard days. Everything was set in days/weeks and we were fully prepared for pandemic waves that were coming up.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
You absolutely need to get Exponea for your business. It is amazing! Like magic, you can create almost everything you need inside. If you ever had troubles with your data or setting up new campaigns for acquisition or retention - Exponea will solve this with so many automatizations that are easy to use in your company - no matter how it is big.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
For example - we had a big problem with keeping our data in retargeting campaigns actual. Exponea helped us save a lot of money on retargeting because of daily imports of new data about our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: As intelligent as you are! A no black box tool.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea provides a capability for you to make your thoughts actionable. Not only does the platform provide a detailed understanding of the customer, but it also allows you to use this data to your benefit. The GUI is pretty intuitive (pretty and intuitive). Data ingestion, processing and utilization, all in a single platform. No black boxes. If you can imagine it, you can do it.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Could be overwhelming for new users, but once you get a hang of the platform, you are the owner of the device. Still it could give you a tough time if this is the first CXP/ CRM tool that you are using.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
All the CRM tools in the industry help capturing customer data, but the level of processing in Exponea is really detailed. RFM, Customer Value... You name it, you have it. It's a very much WYSIWYG tool for Retention and Customer Data professionals. Helps taking A/B tests to the next level and puts customers to the forefront.

Easy to use with experience. I am working in CRM for a long time now, worked with other tools, but this one I easy to use. Everything is understandable you can get certification on usage.

Availability of work with Live Events, availability of code on Landingpages and inside of emails using Jinja2 as Template Coding.

The connection between, Survey, Website, SMS, Website-Push, E-Mail, Push notifications, App-Notifications, Web layers. All in one tool.

The Tool is quick loading even with a big load of Datafeeds (>3 Million rows) or a lot of customers.

Live-Support via Livechat or Slack is helpful to help you with stuff other CRM Company would charge you a lot of money for.

The first time a CRM Tool offers to talk to other customers in a Slack-Community.

You can do everything - but only if you know how to do it. (but the documentation is really good if this one cant help you use the Live-Support)

We solve the issue of having 10 Tools for different Marketing purpose and switched to Exponea now working with one tool.

all_reviews.review_title: Versatile  Platform with Exceptional Support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The platform can be really user-friendly. After you learn how it works, it's easy to navigate the system and do what you want to get done.
The customer support team has been very helpful and responsive. I think we tend to push the platform to its limits, and support is always there to help with our problems or new ideas.
Exponea has been flexible, and we've been able to accomplish some very interesting use-cases.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There are a lot of system updates, and they can break certain parts of our system or disrupt some scenarios we have running. I don't know why there are so many updates.
Since Exponea wasn't built for what we use it for, it can sometimes take a bit of work to make the specific use cases we want. It's not impossible, but we sometimes need to do things via workarounds. I think it would be easier if we were an ecommerce company.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
This platform is extremely versatile and can fit a wide range of needs. I have not worked with a better support team and that alone makes Exponea worth it

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
The fact that we can communicate with segmented sets of customers, with whatever message we need at the time, on whatever channel we need, whenever we need to, is great. We know which customers have received which messages, and which messages are performing best. Overall we can be much more confident about our messaging strategy.

all_reviews.review_title: Great platform, good value, a lot of expectations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Real-time event tracking, very user-friendly interface, very helpful support team, constant improvement and new features introduction.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Sometimes their documentation may not be sufficient to implement the features or complete the integration.
There are certain technical limitations that would take some considerable time to have been implemented: one FCM key per project allows only one App per project for example.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Prepare the most detailed list of requirements.
Be ready to roll out the new email sender as Exponea is integrated with the limited number of them (Mailgun, Mailjet, etc).
It is better to buy the tech consultant hours during the implementation stage to avoid falling into pitfalls.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omni-channel campaign management became easy to implement and benefit from since we implemented Exponea.
To show banners on our site or in our mobile app (Android & IOS) if they are in our platform (active session)
To send browser push and/or mobile push if the user has left our platform recently (active session has been within hours)
To send email to those users who have not had active session for a few days.
To send sms if the user's email became invalid
To add the user to the retargeting campaign if the user stopped reacting to our emails/ push notification and sms.
We also can add new channels and test them without any costly integration by using Exponea's webhooks.

A/B testing became usual for our Campaign Managers. We continuously improve our Campaign performance by introducing new logic and by changing the number of touch points and playing with the new offers. It is very easy to use A/B testing in Exponea and you can basically a/b test anything starting from one channel/campaign to the multivariate/multiple mediums when your A variant is consequently replicated through all touch-points during the campaign.

Customer data management and tracking as well as deduplication and merging all identificators to have 360 customer view and act upon it by sending the notification to them via the most recent interaction or preference history (so we won't send the email to user if they have visited our mobile app just a while ago, we will send the mobile push. And if the user do not read our emails, like the last 3-5 emails but comes back after the sms sent then we will send the next notification via sms instead of piling up the unread email number in their inbox)

Exponea is great in terms of managing the User retention by running campaigns that intend to increase the number of returned users and reduce the churn at the early stages when they lose interest and need attention. Yes, i am talking about RFM segmentation and relative ease of implementation of such technique. Yet your Creative and Content guys should be ready for this challenge as your offer should really be relevant and valuable for these segments.

Use of Jinja, JS, SQL, HTML, CSS in creating/editing weblayers, email templates, extracting the data really helps with getting the right result and meeting business requirements.

We are still exploring their features and looking forward to growing our business with them.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: Real-time event tracking, very user-friendly interface, very helpful support team, constant improvement and new features introduction.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer:
Sometimes their documentation may not be sufficient to implement the features or complete the integration.
There are certain technical limitations that would take some considerable time to have been implemented: one FCM key per project allows only one App per project for example.

Prepare the most detailed list of requirements.
Be ready to roll out the new email sender as Exponea is integrated with the limited number of them (Mailgun, Mailjet, etc).
It is better to buy the tech consultant hours during the implementation stage to avoid falling into pitfalls.

And if the user do not read our emails, like the last 3-5 emails but comes back after the sms sent then we will send the next notification via sms instead of piling up the unread email number in their inbox)

Exponea is great in terms of managing the User retention by running campaigns that intend to increase the number of returned users and reduce the churn at the early stages when they lose interest and need attention. Yes, i am talking about RFM segmentation and relative ease of implementation of such technique. Yet your Creative and Content guys should be ready for this challenge as your offer should really be relevant and valuable for these segments.

Use of Jinja, JS, SQL, HTML, CSS in creating/editing weblayers, email templates, extracting the data really helps with getting the right result and meeting business requirements.

We are still exploring their features and looking forward to growing our business with them.

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea offers productivity !!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
our experience has been very good and the results achieved significant, for a better performance of our entire work team. However, some of the features and updates have minimal bugs. This if improved, could provide higher quality work and the user could increase their productivity on the platform. This is not to say that it is bad at all. But if it could be much better than it already is.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Exponea enables companies to understand their customers and attract them through the collection and analysis of their behavior. You can improve the customer experience and act on their interactions. In addition, the marketing department can evaluate the campaigns and execute an automation in these thanks to the tools provided by the platform. Its interface is fully organized and clean, you can navigate without any problem.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Exponea works very well and is totally suitable for companies that have large e-commerce projects and thus take advantage of the data that the platform provides in real time on user behavior. It is easy to use and simple to configure. The tools and functions it offers such as creating campaigns, granular follow-ups and numbers in real time, personalization, reports, among others, allow your marketing team to obtain a work flow and significant time savings. Totally recommended.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Exponea for our marketing department to communicate with our customers with a better experience that provides effectiveness and significant impact on revenue increases. Our greatest benefit and we consider the most valuable is that our department and marketing team have established incredible independence without having to implement or depend on IT. This platform offers great flexibility, customization, reports, monitoring and numbers in real time, it is definitely very complete, we also have the ability to develop our marketing campaigns in a simpler and faster way.Thanks to this, we have greater work flow and savings in time that we can focus on other areas of our company. Through email marketing, we get in contact with our users effectively obtaining the best results thanks to A / B tests, we are very happy since we reached objectives in a very short time.
