all_reviews.review_title: Great tool that allows our marketing team to be independent
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea connects multiple online marketing tools into a single instrument, thus allowing us to be independent of a data department and other analytics tools. We simply need a graphic designer and marketer who are able to send custom emails, assign credits with scenarios, or create complex reactivation campaigns based on data. With extensive analytics we are able to monitor A/B test results, reach, and other performance metrics of each activity in real-time.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
We would welcome more presentations on new features, as well as other successful case studies, with high quality results in conversion and/or revenue uplift. Each client listens to numbers and looks for inspiration to help them. The most demanding aspect is the evaluation of scenarios and weblayers, we would need more training and examples from practice.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
The most valuable benefit of using Exponea is the independence that a marketing team has, away from an IT department. We can set all marketing acitivites, like banners or emails, test and evaluate them. It is also very important to us to have the ability to monitor the performance in real-time and quickly react to the data with banner variants, changing CTA texts, or other retention and reactivation activities.
Most Exponea activities like emails, banners and weblayers brought us an increase in conversions and additional profit.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Marketing automation tool with the machine learning features directly included in product
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
How easy was to integrate Exponea Solution with our company software and data, but the most exciting part was the marketing automation capabilities of the product. From campaigns management, to web layers and the surrounding machine learning features that range from recommendation to prediction engine. We got from project idea to first campaign up and running in just 1 month. Great value.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Nothing, the product evolves very quickly, so any gaps in functionality are being addressed by the Exponea development team in a very agile fashion. Even after 6 months we are still not using 100% of what Exponea has to offer, but the features that we do use drive 95% of the benefit.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
If you are looking for marketing automation product, you should give Exponea a try. The proof of concept with impact measurement could be done in 1 - 2 months and Exponea offers money back guarantee.  We did NOT utilize the guarantee, as we were very satisfied with the pilot project and now we are running Exponea in 2 countries and across 4 brands and we are preparing to expand to 2 additional countries by year end.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Triggered personalized communication, recommendation of the right product at the right time to the right customer both in email and on the web. Customer base segmentation. The conversion rate of those people that we address through Exponea is on average by more than 30% higher compared to the control group that we are leaving out, so we can measure LIFT impact of using versus NOT using Exponea tooling.

all_reviews.review_title: Straightforward, but limited UI
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
We use Bloomreach for site search and its pretty straightforward and simple to use. The interface is intuitive. Their support team is responsive and knowledgeable. When its working properly, our setting take less than 30 minutes to reflect to our customers.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The interface is somewhat limited in terms of functionality. We have also found that search term synonyms, redirects, etc that we set up will sometimes just not work. The interface shows they are set up correctly, but they are clearly not working on the front end of our site. About every other month, I have to contact their support team about something we set up that isn't working and they take care of it from their end. We also question how well some of their more advanced features work. They said their bots crawl the web each night to find cultural relevance to trending search terms, but I have yet to see evidence of this.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were using the stock site search tool with our CMS prior to bringing in Bloomreach and its definitely way easier and has more capabilities than that. We have much better analytics and reporting and its been a relief to have an account manager helping us with site search, vs. random team members managing in house.

all_reviews.review_title: Young company with an incredible marketing tool and amazing support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Amazing support during integration, but also in training and helping to get the most out of the tool. Very fast integration, incredible depth in the product and flexibility for analysis/setting up campaigns and easy to use vs other tools I've used in the past.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Unfamiliar company in the UK market, so took extra convincing during the pitch process to establish their credentials/credibility, but having worked with them for a couple of months I have no doubts they will be very well known soon! Tool is not 100% there yet, they are still building in some areas which are needed to be a complete solution, but does everything we need at our level of marketing maturity and does it very well.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Don't be put off by the lack of brand awareness in the market, they are an extremely young company and growing fast. Their desire to constantly improve and demonstrate their value, means they are incredibly proactive in suggesting campaigns/tools and the product continues to build the number of features each month, so I would say take advantage of this!

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Replacing a cumbersome and restrictive CRM platform, with something much more agile and automated. So far we have dramatically reduced the manual work for deploying multiple customized campaigns across different territories, enabling the team to focus on coming up with much more creative campaigns in the first place. This speed of deployment also allows for much more flexibility in reacting to competition. Testing has also gone from an incredibly long winded process, to something which we can have running in the background the whole time.

It's easy to use, you can create a nice graph in an instant, send an email campaign with different conditions, the customer support is really supportive and very helpful.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Sometimes, when I have too many Exponea windows opened, it is really slow. There are also some design bugs, but they can be (and I believe will be) quickly fixed.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm using it every day for pretty much everything - analysis of customers' behavior on our web page, sales analysis, monitoring of conversion rate and bounce rate, marketing campaigns... Exponea beautifully complements our databases and other tools that are used in Analytics team. Besides that, it is an irreplaceable tool for our Marketing team. As for the benefits, I like how easy it is to create nice and neat reports and funnels. Also, when you send emails from Exponea, there is a native HTML builder, it's quite easy to use and you can put there many detailed conditions.

all_reviews.review_title: Real-time marketing automation for enterprise companies
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Robust marketing automation tool that allows marketers to track omnichannel customer journeys for complete visibility of the influence on a prospect. It offers lots of integration options that are easy to set-up.
Exponea's capabilities allow for speed in development and deployment of marketing campaigns
Lead scoring helps us to score pretty much everything including demographic data points and user behaviour
Considering how much you can do in this one platform it is relatively easy to pick up and understand. With Exponea, we can not only push out distributions more effectively, but truly measure the impact of campaigns beyond vanity metrics
Advanced scenarios worth mentioning: cart abandonment email, timely sent newsletters, etc
Flexibility, customization, reporting, custom dashboards, granular activity tracking and real-time numbers.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Lack of documentation for specific use cases - you need a help from Exponea expert from time to time to bring your hypothesis to life.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
If you need advanced segmentation and automation tool, Exponea should be on your list.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thanks to Exponea we have realised some significant business benefits. , such us turning our half-manual processes for outbound campaigns into fully automated and tailored customer journeys. Creating, scheduling and sending out emails to large groups. Exponea takes our marketing automation to the next level. It allows us to spend time and build complex campaigns and duplicate the entire campaign to utilize it according the future plans. This saves a lot of time.

all_reviews.review_title: A Wealth of Data
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea is the most robust and customisable marketing automation tool there is ; their platform really excel in its ability to cater for any business data needs; from creating custom funnels, to zeroing in on specific interactions in the customer journey, to 3D reports with complex variances, the options that are available in the is platform are breathtaking.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It is not the easiest platform to learn, and at times the learning curve can be steep. Its wealth of options and custom tools means that users needs some time before one to excel and learn about the hidden ins and outs of the platform.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
For a good alternative to Adobe Marketing Cloud, with more options and customizabilities, Exponea is the way to go for marketing automation, A/B Tests, and data analytics.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are trying to craft CRM and marketing solutions and campaigns around the data and visualizations that are captured from Exponea.  Its Mailgun service is excellent for campaigns; with efficent delivery mechanisms, and its complex integrations with third-party services like Facebook Ads and Google Ad Words also makes it a holistic tool for marketing and engagement.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea is user friendly, after the initial training and integration/pilot phase it's easy to create, deploy, test and evaluate campaigns.

The level of care and attention during the pilot phase is fantastic, guiding both myself and the team throughout the whole process.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
A tool like Exponea requires resource investment - the more you put into the tool, the more you get out of it. Although it suits a variety of businesses (both large and small), be prepared to invest a significant amount of time into the tool - but it's worth it!

all_reviews.review_title: Centralizing marketing activities and taking them to next level
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea integrates many marketing activities into one system and is getting better over time quickly. Automatizations such as triggered actions, e-mails or smart A/B testing are allowing us to address the customer more consistently and effectivelly. The campaign editor is intuitive, super-easy to use and yet so powerful - frankly, when I saw it for the first time, I just said wow. And yeah, the system is still pretty fast overall.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
As we were probably one of the first customers using Exponea (back when it was called Infinario), first integrations were not seamless. But it was tackled really well by Exponea team and the product was getting better literally day by day. Also, the more data it collects, the more options you have how to use them - but the database of events is also growing fast in that event and you can easily run over quotas. Luckily, the team has always been kind and found a way how to solve it together.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used few systems to direct-mail and approach our customers - including in-house built and 3rd party systems. It was hard (and many times impossible) to keep them in sync and they also missed some advanced features. Exponea integrated all this together into one product, get us rid of managing few more databases and now enables us to give our customers more seamless experience. Custom dashboards and integrations with 3rd party apps as Slack are proving to be quite useful for our marketing team, too.

I use mostly the analytics modul, where we focus on high-level data reporting for management; detailed use-cases reports and real-time user activity tracking and monitoring. Working with real-time data saves us time for faster decision making.

all_reviews.review_content:

Very effective and easy to use way how to collect, analyse and understand our clients activity and behaviour. Comes with a possibility to scale output complexity from very vast and deep (for project leads) to high-level overview (executive team).
As co-founder and lead producer in F2P mobile gaming company, I believe that understanding our customer behaviour is a key for company and project success.
Exponea tool set and expertise help us to collect, analyse and understand what our customers do in our game, what they love, and how we can improve their gaming experience (and therefore increase the project performance).
Last but not least Exponea team approach and support is far above industry standard.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Missing the mobile version of our data dashboards.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
1. Amazing tool which allows you to track, store and analyse customer behaviour
2. Easy to use for own customised dashboards and reports
3. Set of other tools (such as scenarios) which make your live much easier
4. Quick and responsive customer support which goes far above industry standards

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Collect user generated data - stop being blind and do design decision which are backed by live data
2. Create customised dashboards and analyses - from deep data analyses to high-level executive summary
3. Compare history of live builds KPIs and trends
4. Use powerful scenario tool to build and run own offer campaigns and sales
5. Optimise and improve project KPIs, revenues and performance

all_reviews.review_title: Great data analytics tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Most of our online activities are linked in with Exponea. We can easily use the triggers, filters and funnels to get the right audience for a specific campaign. It provides endless possibilities, from the way you build a campaign to every details of the campaign. You can customize almost everything virtually in any way you want. Their focus is mainly on conversion and retention. Exponea has many integrations with industry leaders and rich API. That allows us to easily fit into anyone's workflow.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Sometimes the instaOur main objective is to increase ROI in conversion and retention phase, to grow our leads database and nurturing of our leads and marketing activities with fashion sales. With Exponea, we have one centralized platform for all marketing campaigns. We are able to track the customer interactions across multiple brands on our website and approach the right cohort when needed. The system enables a data driven company to demonstrate an impact on the business.nce runs a little slow, but that might be just because of the database size.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
First of all, you should understand that any marketing automation tool is going to enlarge the quality of your underlying marketing strategy. If the strategy is right and strong, you should see more positive results. If not, marketing automation will ensure your poor program is more widely communicated, but probably without better results. Think about your marketing strategy before choosing the marketing automation tool. Don't forget about data quality. Plan to spend some time on cleaning your database and prepare it for the marketing automation, segmentation and content strategy creation.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our main objective is to increase ROI in conversion and retention phase, to grow our leads database and nurturing of our leads and marketing activities with fashion sales. With Exponea, we have one centralized platform for all marketing campaigns. We are able to track the customer interactions across multiple brands on our website and approach the right cohort when needed. The system enables a data driven company to demonstrate an impact on the business.

all_reviews.review_title: Breathtaking Tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The flexibility of Exponea is suitable for us. Of course, no software is going to enable you to do every single thing your brain can come up with, but Exponea comes pretty close. We are able to gather data through engagement incentives and on site web banners. Having our lead database, emails, surveys, NPS banners and customized dashboards all in one tool enable us to streamline our campaign efficiently.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Nothing I can think of. I have nothing to say.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
I find the tool to be one of the most intuitive out there. You can set up and send emails within minutes.  The way the platform is set up allows you to quickly find what you need and execute non advanced campaigns. Plus support is really really helpful.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are a company with many marketing needs and Exponea is truly a tool that scales to the size of our client's needs. For us as an agency, we offer our clients variety of solutions and one tool and in this case one tool seems to be a fit for everyone, thanks to its flexibility. We use it mainly for lead generation, newsletter and email programs, web layers, A/b testing and reporting.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Flexibility and customisation. We went through many analytics tools and as they look good on first sight and offer pre-made dashboard, we run into problems, whenever we needed something custom made for our own needs and own tracking. With Exponea, we finally found tool, that doesn't limit us and we can track basically whatever we want, however we want and react to those data as we need. We didn't find any limitation in our needs so far and that is unique!

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Could be faster learning curve. It takes some time to get into it.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
We had already plan to start implementing own solution as we were very disappointed with tools available. Exponea changed our plans. I recommend for everyone who needs quality tracking of user behaviour and custom needs.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are gaming company and creating free to play games, where analysing user data and behaviour is essential to succeed. Exponea helped us to find problems and to make solutions for them. From time we have Expona we significantly grew all our KPIs.  We like Expona mostly because it is framework, that can tailor our need in analytics, dashboard and campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful omni-channel event-driven marketing automation solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Empowering business users to access powerful insights about customer behavior is at the core of why I can recommend Exponea also to major corporations - no need to wait for IT or have extensive code skills to prepare the insight a business / marketing user needs. Second important differentiator is the ease of implementing a omni-channel view of a customers interactions and the ability to have this "time-line" perspective. With lots of customer touchpoints this can be a daunting (and yet so essential) task in any typical corporation. Finally, the speed at which campaigns can be brought to life really allows for lots of room for experimentation & testing.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
You still need to involve someone with technical skills for many campaign elements once you want to start to be sophisticated. There are also minor things in the solution that could use improvement - such as the ability to select inverse parts within a funnel (customers who did not reach that step), however the people at Exponea are releasing upgrades to the solution regularly so I expect such nuances will be gone soon.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Go for it :) Very fast initial results and lots of space to go into complex recommendations, next best action models, data insights, integrations etc.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Gaining a omni-channel view of all customer interactions relevant for business and subsequently shifting marketing communication towards a far more personalized, event-driven approach to decrease the amount of communication towards the customer, however significantly increase its impact on revenue. With multiple deployments & projects built on Exponea we have time and again achieved quick & visible impact on sales volume, avg revenue and customer satifaction.

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea is like a swiss army knife - it's ready to help you out with any possible eventuality.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
At Slido, we want to enhance the engagement of your audience at conferences. Event and marketing managers are our main customers. Exponea helps us to predict our customers' behavior and data-based decisions. Historical event data is important to us - by leveraging it we build predictive analyses of what decisions our customers are most likely to make. Our decision tree optimally segments users by their probability to achieve a given goal.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It would be great to have a mobile app to easily access our dashboards on the go.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Each flow on the Slido website starts and ends with a specific event. I really appreciate presented visualisations of the customer journey between selected events with the ability to drill-down and further filter events from the columns. Regarding the flows, we are interested mainly in what customers do after visiting a website, what are the events and actions preceding the end of a visit.
Regarding specific campaigns we track what action customers make after a clicking to an URL and which events result to a conversion.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea enables me to create a campaign in a few clicks and helps me be both more efficient and effective in my work. Particularly, I like flexibility of email editor and personalization possibilities which help me to create relevant content to our customer and send it to them at per-person tailor time. Exponea's flexibility enables me to think of infinite number use-cases since from my experience there is always a way how to do it in Exponea. There is always a consultant ready to help me and support on my hacking journey for a new out of the box use-case.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There are occasional UX struggles which however do not influence the functionality, rather design. I would like to have an access from mobile which Exponea does not offer.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Most important thing in the beginning is "internal audit" of data and what you want to track and how. Without that no marketing cloud will be good.

all_reviews.review_title: Empowering solution that makes marketers less dependent on IT department
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Apart from great UX which makes the platform very easy to use, even for new user, I appreciate how expeonea empowers growth marketers by making them less dependent on IT departments. This solution makes designing, test and evaluating the impact of new email campaign, web layer or targeting incredibly easy. Last but not least, it works very well with 3rd parties - we''ve been enjoying the benefits of its integration with both Facebook and Adwords API lately.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Since Exponea is still a fast growing SaaS company, there are obviously some growing pains. We have noticed that are account managers have been changed a couple times. I assume this is due to rapid growth of the company itself.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
I highly recommend Exponea. It is a platform, do not count on it making  the magic happen by itself - but it will empower you to make it happen. All in all it is a great product with superb support (seriously, they usually reply within 5 minutes of your request) and I honestly can't  recommend it enough.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
As I mentioned earlier, it empowers marketers by making them less dependent on the IT. If we decide to test a new trigger-mail scenario, we do not have to ask our IT department to do all the heavy lifting - prepare the segments, set up the mailing etc anymore. This provides us with dramatically quicker iteration cycle and allows us to test a lot more hypothesis while saving precious development time.

Additionally, I enjoy the fact that customer segments from exponea can be used as audiences in both adwords and facebook - which provides us with even more smart options in terms of LTV management.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: Apart from great UX which makes the platform very easy to use, even for new user, I appreciate how expeonea empowers growth marketers by making them less dependent on IT departments. This solution makes designing, test and evaluating the impact of new email campaign, web layer or targeting incredibly easy. Last but not least, it works very well with 3rd parties - we''ve been enjoying the benefits of its integration with both Facebook and Adwords API lately.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
review_question_answers.answer: Since Exponea is still a fast growing SaaS company, there are obviously some growing pains. We have noticed that are account managers have been changed a couple times. I assume this is due to rapid growth of the company itself.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
review_question_answers.answer: I highly recommend Exponea. It is a platform, do not count on it making  the magic happen by itself - but it will empower you to make it happen. All in all it is a great product with superb support (seriously, they usually reply within 5 minutes of your request) and I honestly can't  recommend it enough.

all_reviews.review_title: Automation, segmentation and marketing optimization under one roof
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
You can dynamically change / add / edit content on your website and use A/B testing very effectively without programmers. It's easier to create e-mail campaigns in 9 different countries comparing to other tools on market (eg. Mailchimp, Getresponse...). We have created new reports which helped us to analyze marketing more then Google Analytics.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Integration was a bit tricky and took a more time then we expected, but people from Exponea did a great work during our 2-months warm-up process. It took a 1-2 months until you will find out how to fully use this platform.

Higher cost

Easier coordination of marketing through 9 markets
Better analyses than in Google Analytics

all_reviews.review_title: i love their support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The flexibility of Exponea is the reason why I think this marketing cloud is one of the best performers in the industry. If you have the right approach, it is easy and intuitive to create actionable reports and custom made funnels. I enjoy the ease of use and the dashboards - you can set up a table with dimensions, tailored metrics, breakdowns and run reports within minutes. It enables me to split different traffic and conversion variables and report on large sums of data to dive deeper and see the key trends that affect our website.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It takes some time to start enjoying the full power of the tool - you need to work with the tool on a daily basis.
Recommendations to others considering the product
It is an enterprising analytics and automation tool - it involves considerable investment on a periodic basis. On the other hand, it delivers the promised value thanks to campaign modules.
Recommendations to others considering the product
We are improving the usability of our website both for prospects and customers. Trying to see the comprehensive behaviour of our customers. Exponea helps us to see how they convert from prospect, to lead, to customer. It also helps us to see if our campaigns have received any traffic and improves the evaluation of the campaign sources.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
They have really good reports and options

all_reviews.review_title: New generation of marketing automation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Impressive ability to view people's data and how they interacted with your website. You can create custom metrics, user journey flows and are able to track events that are usually harder to track via GA. The queries are fast, as well, and you can get the full picture of your data. The actual integration is simple enough that frontend developers can handle it in a short period of time.
The campaigns ( weblayers, email campaigns) help us to create the biggest value regarding sales and revenue. Creating email campaigns is simple, even when you use advanced scenarios (like cart abandonment emails or newsletter with dynamic timing).

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Nothing in particular. Usually every problem in Exponea has its solution through some workaround

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Exponea helps us to schedule emails to deploy, create WYSIWYG drag and drop email templates, personalize content and track user activities. We are able to gather critical information about prospect consumers from the website, newsletters, social media, banners etc. to focus attention on improving those areas. Exponea is able to gather unique information specifically targeted to leads and opportunities through all the stages of the sales funnel to ensure we are communicating the right message, at the right moment, to the right audience.

all_reviews.review_title: Real-time analytics done easy
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea provides complex analysis that updates real-time, with easy to follow integration. Comparing to other products on the market, the only better option is running your own analytics infra, but you would need entire team taking care of that. With exponea, anybody on the team can quickly create data visualizations.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Being real-time, your data has to follow certain rules - there are no joins, data has to be processed in linear time. There are easy workarounds for this and Exponea people help us with use cases on how to follow these rules.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Best complete analytics package on the market.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use it as primary analytics tool for our free to play game, recently we also tried it for creating segmentations and running scenarios activating special offers for our customers.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
It's an easy way to work with our customer base - segment, analyse and then take action. We use it daily to send our newsletter, to improve personalisation based on what customers buy/see, and scenarios based on actions our customers take on e-shop.

They are still working on building the product, so we see new features and improvements first-hand.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
For advanced solutions and analysis we need the help from Exponea support team. But they respond very quickly and we always find solutions.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
This is useful tool, if you need to work with your customer base. They have very supportive team.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
- to analyse behaviour and segment our customers for more relevant communication
- bring relevant content in our emailing to different customer groups
- to deliver the emailing at the time our customers are use to open it
- to automate and personalise:
-- abandoned cart - if our customers forget something in cart
-- last seen products - if customer is browsing products, but not adding them to cart
-- re/activation campaigns
-- ...and more cases to improve the Conversion Rate

all_reviews.review_title: Intuitive Data and Marketing Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
The ability to build and share Dashboards for external partners and quick prototyping of reporting views.
Easiness of use even for data and analysis newbies.
Level of customer support.
The reputation of Exponea as employer.

Security and trackability are generally very well thought out.
Real-time big data management is well done.
There has been little to none down-time so far.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Sometimes the rate of innovations in the product is too quick to catch up with. Also the documentation catches up vagrantly.
Data imports are rudimentary at current level but word is campaign management is going to improve.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Make sure to join the Slack community for additional resources.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're using the reporting features as single source of truth within the company. Dashboards in use show the state of the company from various points of view on monthly or weekly basis, or even allow an operational view drilling down to hours and minutes, particularly useful when analysing new distributions.

Reports allow slicing and dicing of event based data. Analysts have a variety of tools including a Flow chart effectively allowing to cross-check with other data sources within the company such as Google Analytics.

Campaigns allow rapid marketing e-mail or weblayer campaigns design, testing and evaluation. This is particularly useful for e-commerce.

We have also repurposed the push features to allow secure, trackable and targeted in-app communication with end-users of our product, a browser-extension best-in-breed password manager.

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea- great tool for marketing campaigns, analyzes and segmentation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
We use Exponea as the platform, where we can control all our marketing efforts, lead flows and activities. Once you have arranged all the triggered campaigns and scenarios, the main part is done. After that we are able to analyze the performance from top of the funnel all the way to conversions. The preparation of newsletter campaigns is simple and smooth. The deliverability functionality provides flexible amount of control and we are sure emails get delivered. Users also gets to see the coding behind the customization. Set-up of pop-up banners is easy to make and helps simplify processes.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Exponea might be tough to learn, so make sure you have employees who can learn technology quickly and are able to use the full potential of advanced use cases. Also, there is a small user community at the moment.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Segmentation of a target audience, real-time access to our data and scalable solution to add new data when applicable. We segment our client database into as many categories as needed, to send relevant personalized content to them. Other benefits worth mentioning:
*	A/B testing & web personalization
*	Solid support from Exponea consultants
*	Variety of pop-up banners
*	Real-time campaign data reporting

all_reviews.review_title: The marketing tool with a friendly interface and strong power
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
1. It is really fast - built as a single unified solution from scratch, the modules work great together >> I appreciate confident integration between data collection, analytics, and execution
2. After integration, we need our IT guys just from time to time - we are completely independent as it provides accurate data for our analytics and promotional campaign needs.
3. Funnels - this feature simplifies targeting and at the same time can be used across platforms. All funnels are retrospective and are always calculated instantly from our data.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Hard to say. We are satisfied from analytical point of view.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
I would suggest this for bigger businesses. It may be pricey for small and mid sized companies.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Benefits from my point of view as a data person:
1. Tracking all customer interactions across devices and channels, turning them into measurable and meaningful data insights
2. Data imports from our other systems to Exponea gives you the whole picture about your website visitors
3. Predefined webhook integrations to interact with Slack, Messenger or any other custom webhook for our own backend
4. The wysiwyg (what you see is what you get) email template editor works great and saves us a lot of time. Also our managers can handle to create a simple newsletter, hence they don't have graphic recources

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea experience feedback
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
I have been working with Exponea since the beginning of 2017. It's a critical tool we use in our business to target specific customer segments, to track and evaluate our emailing performance, to trigger SMS campaigns and much more. Exponea provides into depth capabilities for extracting customer insights that we use in our marketing campaigns and most specifically emailing campaigns. Exponea has lots of capabilities that allow you to extract a wide variety of reports and its integration with our systems provides an easy workflow for us.

One of the most appreciated aspects for us has been the support received from the Exponea contact points. Every time we wanted to try something new, or wanted to find an answer to a problem/question, the support received has been always timely and on point. Thumbs up!

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Along the time, we experienced many down times of the tool, so this is an aspect that can be improved. Also, there are several aspects related to the user experience that can improve the time spent on using the tool from our side. In the same time, related to the Exponea emailing capabilities, (the way an email template is built in Exponea) this can improve also.


What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used Exponea especially for the malining campaigns (and here we used the AB testing capabilities, tracking performance, targeting specific customers and extracting specific customers from the tool), for implementing web layers in our website, sending SMS campaigns to our users. For sure we will discover more capabilities that we can use in the near future.

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea - perfect marketing tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea does a lot of progressive automation, that is more powerful and flexible than other robust tools. It offers a solid mix of usability and functionality. If your goal is to see immediate results in a few weeks, Exponea is a perfect fit. Anyone can build comprehensive scenarios, funnels, workflows, data segments and customize onsite digital notifications without advanced developer skills. The real-time, drag'N'drop style canvas is intuitive for business users to exploit as well.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Sometimes it takes some time to get the data you would like to have immediately. Also mobile application with dashboards would be much appreciated.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
It is worth considering if you are an organization with urgent needs for series of email solution.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our goals is to improve online experience for our visitors. I work with reports from multiple sources - Exponea makes it easy for me to link them all together,  provides me reports that give me better insight I need and the next action I should take. Thanks to evaluation of the campaigns we know who is engaging with our content and who is not, which allows us to focus on the right efforts. To sum up, it has helped us in many ways from advanced segmentation, through  creating and executing automated email campaigns to reporting in customized dashboards.

all_reviews.review_title: The BEST marketing and analytics tool out there!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
There are 3 key feats I really like about Exponea the most: realtime data, usability and support.
The data that we work with are not sampled or delayed by days, it is realtime. If you need a different point of view on your data, you simply do it by yourself and see it the next moment. When you start a new campaign, you keep on refreshing the dashboards to see how it goes - better than watching NHL live!
That connects to usability: we use the data directly for action in the scenarios to eg create offers for specific segments of users or purely based on their behavior in our app - in a very user friendly interface. Also learning how to use Exponea is super fast - a quick onboarding and you're ready to go. Need an AB test? No prob.
Third, if we get stuck or have questions, the support guys help us in a matter of a few business hours. Also we get their suggestions and help on how to improve our analytics and campaigns. They are helping us to improve the way we work with data and grow our business. Very useful, as we are not really data scientists.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
It is hard to find flaws or specifically stuff I don't like about Exponea - for our use case it's the best out of the tools we tried. However, as Exponea is realtime, it has a hard time with complex queries of type n-squared. Part of that problem is the usage of averages, but not having a median directly. We don't need these on a daily basis and for weekly or monthly BI reports and aggregated data we use Excell (then you don't need to handle 100M's of events in data).

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
If you are looking for a marketing and analytics tool which 1. is realtime, 2. easy to use, 3. has a great support, then you found it. The implementation from zero is quite straight forward, too.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are a mobile free-to-play game dev company, so data and user behavior is the core of our business.
First of all, with Exponea, we managed to grow as a company and fully implement a data driven approach to our company - thinking in KPIs, experiments and proof not in feelings but in numbers, on a daily basis. We base our decisions on data, because it is so easy to get data and work with data.
Second, a lot of direct improvements were achieved, eg, we improved the performance of onboarding funnel by 350% and the offers monetization more than 250% and still see (thanks to data) plenty of space for improvement. Also, we have been able to identify flaws and weak points in the UX of our game and fix them - game economy, balancing of levels, fail rates, etc.

all_reviews.review_title: Analytics and automation booster for your company
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea consists of two large families of features, i.e. Campaigns and Analytics. We use mainly the analytics part, that is crafted into an easy-to-use Dashboard, which represents a one-stop-shop for important indicators and metrics. Where you can easily add or edit Customer Profiles and make use of behavior history and analytics to improve result delivery times. Thanks to event attributes we can run aggregate or expression, for example you can select event session start and its attribute country into rows. There are also multiple modifiers in report metrics, which help visualize our the data in tables.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Since we work with Exponea dashboards, mobile application would be much appreciated.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use revenue attribution report to get a comprehensive overview of acquisition sources and customer touch-points leading a purchase. Multiple models include first/last touch, linear, and time decay. Also Exponea allowed our IT department to refocus on their traditional operational support roles.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There is not much to dislike when working with exponea, because this tool makes my daily routine so much easier! But if I need to think at least of one negative, it is missing autosave.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
a/b testing regarding content, sender, sending time etc. data in real time - allows us to react quickly on our customers needs, optimise campaigns and increase our KPIs

all_reviews.review_title: Good analytics software with good support from developer side.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
I really love that Exponea is oriented towards direct execution and fast result delivery - this suits us a lot. Exponea is a great combination of analytics and engagement automation to improve customer experience. Marketing automation is one of the most advanced I have ever experienced. We use Exponea's attribution models for specific use cases, personalized and running Aggregates, custom metrics, and SQL Reporters.
Initial Integration took us few hours. Fully operational within 2-3 weeks. What I value the most is that Exponea does not require our IT department capacity for ongoing support and maintenance.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Nothing specific. Exponea solved us the most challenging use cases. We just need to be up to date because of the new features every 2-3 weeks.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Exponea is loaded with features that will help you understand your customers, and respond to their priorities in real time. We use Exponea for:
omnichannel campaigns to reach our customers with personalized and timely messages. Our main target is to significantly enhance our opportunities to acquire a loyal customer.
One time banner possibilities - we wanted a  promotion that would be seen just once by our customers. We created a web layer banner promoting a huge discount for the whole spring deal. The marketing message was "now or never". It was quite easy to create it via web layer feature in Exponea app with significant impact on activating new members.
last seen products
targeted email marketing campaigns
geo analysis

all_reviews.review_title: Advanced web personalisation and cross channel campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Exponea basically brings the arrows to your boxes. Load your customer data into Exponea, connect data with the behaviour of your customers and personalise the website experience for each customer.  Thanks to existing out-of-the box integrations you are able to create and run multichannel campaigns through SMS, email, AdWords or Facebook. Targetting for all channels and website personalisation is made from one place in the scenario editor.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The price can be discouraging at first thought, however if configured and deployed correctly, you will definitely get a hugely positive ROI.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Exponea helps us to realize cross and omnichannel campaigns easily.

Exponea is the first thing I launch every morning.

The Exponea team will show you their product in different angles, will explain to you what are the features you could use the best and will teach you anything you would need in order to use the software. They will give you support both face-to-face, on-line, over the phone, on Slack etc.

Moreover, there are so many things you can do with their software - you just have to explain which issue you want to sort out and they will create a tailor-made plan for you.

We use Exponea primarily for upsale of our news subscription, special time limited offers etc. We also look at their analytic data in order to evaluate the campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: The most complete and integrated marketing cloud I've tried
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
All the tools in one platform; incredibly in depth analytics, powerful campaign builder, great segmentation options. Very versatile, customizable and expandable.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
Having so many options and variables to play with when creating charts, campaigns or scenarios can make the interface get a little bit cumbersome when working in a small laptop screen.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Although Exponea's entry level price might be high for a small businesses, after reviewing 17 different marketing cloud and marketing automation solutions it was the only tool that could provide us with everything we were looking for. If you're willing to invest in a high-grade solution with excellent support, Exponea is definitely the way to go.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm providing my clients a really robust marketing cloud that can target customers in different channels based on actions and behaviors, accelerating lead conversion, nurturing prospects, increasing sales and lowering the cost per lead. And the beauty of it is that everything can measured in real time and improved accordingly.

all_reviews.review_title: Brain of your marketing stack
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
We shifted from an endless stream of tools to a single platform. First we used Exponea just for analytics. After we realized the confusion about "what each metric/report in previous tools means and why they differ" is gone, we made Exponea a brain of our marketing stack -> data flows both ways, in and out.
We stopped exporting contacts from analytics tools and importing them to emailing tools and it saved us lot of time. Exponea allows you to execute omni-channel campaigns from one system through its ability to easily integrate with almost any system and trigger the right kind of action in your call-centre system or POS system. Plus big thumbs up for the user interface.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
The most difficult attribution challenge is with offline campaigns, but our main focus is online environment. This is not an issue for us.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Exponea helped us to reach our customers by personalized messages and emails. We mainly use Exponea email management tools. You just drag & drop all the elements and key visuals; and email template is ready in a few seconds.

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea is a perfect tool which makes event marketing and communication much more effective!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
It is a great tool for multi-platform communication including my favourite email delivering oversight features. I love how easy it is to plan email campaigns for specific customer segments and situations. I use scenarios a lot. Its is also very helpful to see how many customers really open emails and how many of them click on links in the email. It gives me a great feedback and helps me to understand how to attract them and what is their motivation.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
I miss calendar planning. It would be much easier to plan email campaigns through calendar and visually see when our customers will receive emails from me or my colleagues. It would be great especially for teams where more people are using Exponea.

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
You should definitely try it. I am almost sure that it will make your work much more effective, your hypothesis more clear thanks to several analysis and data and it saves you lots of time and solves lots of difficulties while communicating with customers.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Exponea is a game changer for us while promoting events and communicating with customers. We are organizing several conferences a year and Exponea is a perfect tool how to promote these events and communicate with customers during marketing campaigns. Thanks to scenarios we can easily choose to whom we want to send a specific email which reflects their situation. Exponea makes marketing much easier and much more effective thanks to metrics which we can analyze, compare and choose from. On the other hand, it also provides quick way how to A-B test different scenarios and apply changes and new hypothesis very easily.

all_reviews.review_title: Exponea helps in increasing effectivity of Telco operator's campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bloomreach?
Flexibility, real-time metrics, great Exponea support, possibility to affect campaign immediately and no need to use other tools.

What do you dislike about Bloomreach?
There's nothing really to dislike. Sometimes clients do not understand that things can go that easy :)

Recommendations to others considering Bloomreach:
Check all direct execution platforms on the market. Compare their functionalities and price and you will get to the decision we made - to switch to Exponea.

What problems is Bloomreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have used Exponea for effectivity increase of campaigns for a leading Telco operator. In this exact case, we appreciated mainly its incredible flexibility. That is built on an autonomous, immediate entry into the system of our client's website, without intervention of their web administrator. That was the only way we could reverse negative trends in their media curve. Waiting for administrators would cause fatal delays in each of their campaigns. This real-time change option, as well as real-time analytics of Exponea, which allow us to adjust campaigns several times a day, have resulted in a clear increase in ROI for this particular client.

all_reviews.review_content:

We have used Exponea's tool and consulting support for the now famous Fofola campaign, which has won two Gold Effie Awards for communication effectiveness. Exponea gave us a number of media insights. For example, after analyzing Facebook and YouTube traffic to the campaign website, we realized that while both had similar costs, the people coming from YouTube spent more time and were more active on our website. We changed our media planning and the campaign became more effective.

It will be great to have powerpoint-ready exports of the results for marketing departments.
